Schwedisch</a>\n<a rel="nofollow" href="https://addons.mozilla.org/tr/firefox/addon/download-status-bar/" title="Türkisch">tr - Türkisch</a>\n<a rel="nofollow" href="https://addons.mozilla.org/zh-CN/firefox/addon/download-status-bar/" title="Chinesisch (Vereinfacht)">zh-CN - Chinesisch (Vereinfacht)</a>\n<a rel="nofollow" href="https://addons.mozilla.org/zh-TW/firefox/addon/download-status-bar/" title="Chinesisch (Traditionell)">zh-TW - Chinesisch (Traditionell)</a>\n\n<i>Diese Seite wird in wenigen Tagen vollständig in Ihre eigene Sprache übersetzt sein. Vielen Dank für Ihr Verständnis und Ihre Geduld!</i>\n\nWenn Sie \'Download Status Bar\' in Ihrer eigenen Sprache haben möchten, können Sie das Add-on jederzeit auf BabelZilla übersetzen.\n\n<a rel="nofollow" href="https://outgoing.prod.mozaws.net/v1/4b280a826a0133a76b2766145fdfc4632e8e08769ec15d98a7f72bbdd5bb4b2d/http%3A//www.babelzilla.org/index.php%3Foption=com_wts&amp;extension=5704&amp;type=show">http://www.babelzilla.org/index.php?option=com_wts&amp;extension=5704&amp;type=show</a>\n\n+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++\n\nWeitere Hilfe finden Sie auf MozillaZine in diesem Thread:\n<a rel="nofollow" href="https://outgoing.prod.mozaws.net/v1/88aabce9cf880221d6d8b1b9a2fd1cc87fab041d922595e782726a99d4ba5883/http%3A//forums.mozillazine.org/viewtopic.php%3Ff=48&amp;t=2782661">http://forums.mozillazine.org/viewtopic.php?f=48&amp;t=2782661</a>',
     nl:
      'Download Status Bar verzorgt ieder aspect van uw downloads (<strong>Uitvoeren</strong>, <strong>Weergeven</strong>, <strong>Scannen</strong>, <strong>Hernoemen</strong>, <strong>Checksum</strong>, <strong>Pauzeren</strong>, <strong>Hervatten</strong>, <strong>Annuleren</strong>, <strong>Opschonen</strong>, <strong>Verwijderen</strong>), genereert statistieken van uw downloads, houdt de geschiedenis van uw vorige downloadsessies bij, en nog veel meer. Het is niet slechts een add-on voor downloadbeheer, maar helpt u ook uw productiviteit te vergroten.\n\nDownload Status Bar is speciaal ontworpen aan de hand van uw behoeften en verzoeken. Uw verwachtingen zijn bij de ontwikkeling van de add-on centraal geplaatst, gebruikmakend van de laatste mogelijkheden van Firefox 26, om zo de prestaties van uw browser en downloads te bevorderen. Download Status Bar is projectgedreven en wordt beheerd door de gebruikers van deze add-on, wat hem actueel en krachtig houdt.\n\nInstalleer Download Status Bar en neem de controle over uw downloads.\n\n<b>Functies</b>\n\n✓ Supports Firefox 26, Firefox 28, Firefox Australis and Firefox 31\n✓ Supports Firefox 25, Firefox 24 ESR and Firefox 24 Before\n✓ Supports Pale Moon\n✓ Automatically close download bar when all downloads completed\n✓ Open download directory when the download is completed\n✓ Clear the download item after launching it\n✓ Clear the download item after showing file\n✓ Download Progress Color\n✓ Download Text Color\n✓ Manual Virus Scan\n✓ Automatic Virus Scan\n✓ Disable virus scan for certain file types\n✓ Double Click on download item will Launch the download file\n✓ Open Download Tab\n✓ Options reachable as Add-on Preferences in Tools / Add-ons / Download Status Bar\n✓ Last Clear will auto close Download Bar\n✓ Key to toggle Download Bar = CTRL + ALT + D for Windows / CMD + ALT + D for Mac\n✓ Go to Download Page\n✓ Copy Download Link\n✓ Download Complete Color\n✓ Play notification sound (supports .ogg, .wav, .mp3 file types)\n✓ Pause/Start/Cancel buttons\n✓ Delete File\n✓ Double click on empty bar space will auto clear completed download items\n✓ Download Speed Color + 4 customizable color\n✓ Download Background Color\n✓ Tools menu option to toggle Download Status Bar\n✓ Flexible Download items\n✓ Download width can be set to a fixed value\n✓ Wildcard support for Auto Clear\n✓ Reset Color Settings\n✓ Right click on empty bar space will show Add-on Menu\n✓ Left Click on download item will show download Information Panel\n✓ Auto Close for Wildcard Clear\n✓ Reset Settings for Notification Sound\n✓ Last Launch will auto close Download Bar\n✓ Last Show File will auto close Download Bar\n✓ Download Panel for Add-on Bar\n✓ Middle click on Download item will clear it\n✓ Clear Button\n✓ Progress percentage, Speed and Remaining time as Progress Notification can be customizable.\n✓ Flash Video Downloader support\n✓ Download Item Width &amp; Height set\n✓ Auto open Download Tab when a Download starts\n✓ Hide Clear Button option\n✓ Mouseover on Download item will open Information Tooltip\n✓ Hide Downloads Button\n✓ Rename File\n✓ Pause All Downloads\n✓ Resume All Downloads\n✓ Cancel All Downloads\n✓ On the fly Option change feature\n✓ Previewing downloaded image files in Information Popup\n✓ Target entry in Information Popup shows File save location\n✓ Clicking Source entry in Information Popup opens it in New Tab\n✓ Clicking Target entry in Information Popup shows the Target file\n✓ Long Source entries are trimmed in Information Popup\n✓ Hovering Source and Target entries shows tooltip\n✓ Downloaded entry in Information Popup shows downloaded bytes\n✓ Preview completed Image files (supports PNG, GIF, JPG, BMP) in Information Popup\n✓ Clicking on preview image opens it in New Tab\n✓ Icons for Context Menus\n✓ Movable Panel can be pinned to Navigation Toolbar\n✓ Drag n Drop Download item will copy file into target folder\n✓ Privacy window support\n✓ Download Counter for Toolbar button\n✓ Porting downloads between Bar and Panel\n✓ Options Windows auto focus\n✓ Download Pause Color\n✓ Bar Background Color\n✓ Drag n Drop after Download complete\n✓ History feature. Download Status Bar will remember downloaded files across sessions.\n✓ Open Download Tab only utilizes one tab\n✓ Case insensitivity for file extensions\n✓ Gradient Color for Interface Elements (Download background, progress, complete, pause and speed color can be styled with a linear gradient rather than flat color)\n✓ Arguments for Virus Scanner\n✓ Delete File Warning\n✓ Bar Background Color now has gradient\n✓ Clean completed Downloads when Firefox quits\n✓ Progress Notifications (Progress, Speed and Remaining Time) can be shown/hidden\n✓ 4 color for Download Speed\n✓ Resume context option\n✓ Closing download bar automatically after specific time. This new option is placed above Auto Clear option in Options window.\n✓ MD5 Hash feature in Information Popup.\n✓ Preview for JPEG file.\n✓ "Ask confirmation before deleting downloaded file" option\n✓ Checksum Window to calculate MD5, MD2, SHA1, SHA256, SHA384, SHA512 and compare.\n✓ Statistics Page which is accessible from Add-on context menu\n✓ Vertical/Horizontal Progress Notifications\n✓ Font Size for File Name and Progress Notifications\n✓ Help Page contains full tutorial for Download Status Bar. (Right click Downloads button and select Help option from context menu to open up Help Page)\n✓ Rename Window Interface Update. (It is quicker to rename file now by separated File Name and Extension textboxes.)\n✓ Double Click functionality for Download Item can be set to either Launch or Show File via Options Window. It is placed under "Ask confirmation before deleting downloaded file".\n✓ Keyboard short-cut change via "extensions.downloadbar.shortcutkey" preference if you have a conflicting short-cut. You need to restart Firefox for the new short-cut.\n✓ "Send to" feature to send files to selected folders. Defaults are Desktop and Downloads directory and you can also chose another directory by Custom option.\n\n✓ Locale en-US\n✓ Locale fi-FI Finnish\n✓ Locale de German\n✓ Locale it Italian\n✓ Locale nl Dutch\n✓ Locale pl Polish\n✓ Locale sv-SE Swedish\n✓ Locale zh-CN Chinese (Simplified)\n✓ Locale zh-TW Chinese (Traditional)\n✓ Locale pt-BR Portuguese (Brazilian)\n✓ Locale tr Turkish\n✓ Locale hu Hungarian\n✓ Locale ro Romanian\n✓ Locale ja-JP Japanese\n✓ Locale ru Russian\n✓ Locale fr French\n✓ Locale mk-MK Macedonian\n\nWanneer u bestanden van internet downloadt plaatst Download Status Bar automatisch voortgangsindicatoren in de downloadbalk voor u. Zoals de naam al suggereert is de downloadbalk de balk onderaan het Firefox-venster, meestal boven de add-onbalk. Omdat Download Status Bar gebruikersvriendelijk en slim genoeg is, is het alleen maar zichtbaar tijdens een actieve download. Als er geen download is om weer te geven, verbergt Download Status Bar zichzelf automatisch om u meer webpagina te kunnen laten zien. Het komt vanzelf weer tevoorschijn als u een bestand begint te downloaden.\n\nMaar als u Download Status Bar zelfs wilt zien als er geen download is, dan kunt u onderstaande sneltoetsen gebruiken:\n\n<b>Windows: Ctrl+Alt+D</b>\n\n<b>Mac OS X: Shift+Alt+D</b>\n\n<b>Linux: (Ctrl/Cmd)+Alt+D</b>\n\nU kunt bovenstaande sneltoetsen ook gebruiken om de downloadbalk op elk gewenst moment te verbergen. Met andere woorden: deze sneltoetsen wisselen de downloadbalk voor u. Als alternatieve optie kunt u de downloadbalk in- en uitschakelen via het menu Download Status Bar in het menu Extra van Firefox.\n\nNadat u de downloadbalk hebt geopend ziet u een knop Downloads links en een knop Wissen rechts op de balk. De knop Downloads is de belangrijkste knop van Download Status Bar; u kunt erop klikken om de contextmenu van de add-on te openen. De knop Wissen wordt gebruikt om alle afgeronde downloads met een muisklik op te schonen uit de downloadbalk.\n\nDoor op de knop Downloads te klikken ziet u het hieronder beschreven contextmenu:\n<ul><li><b>Opties:</b> Deze menu-optie opent het optiesvenster, waar u de add-on naar wens kunt aanpassen.</li><li><b>Statistieken:</b> Deze menu-optie opent de statistiekenpagina met gegevens en grafieken voor uw eerdere downloadacties.</li><li><b>Downloadgeschiedenis weergeven:</b> Deze menu-optie opent de standaard Firefox-geschiedenisbibliotheek, voor het geval u uw downloads als een lijst in een venster wilt weergeven.</li><li><b>Downloadtabblad openen:</b> Deze menu-optie opent de standaard Firefox-geschiedenisbibliotheek als een browsertabblad.</li><li><b>Downloads:</b> Middels de opties Alle downloads pauzeren, Alle downloads hervatten, Alle downloads annuleren en Alle downloads opschonen kunt u uw downloads gegroepeerd beheren.</li><li><b>Help:</b> Deze menu-optie opent de hulppagina van Download Status Bar, waar u details over de add-on kunt vinden en hoe u deze op efficiënte manier kunt gebruiken.</li><li><b>Balk sluiten:</b> Deze menu-optie sluit de downloadbalk voor u.</li></ul>Als u bestanden van het web downloadt plaatst Download Status Bar automatisch downloaditems in de downloadbalk. Hieronder staat wat voorbeeldsoftware van Mozilla om te downloaden. Klik erop om te starten met downloaden.\n\n<a rel="nofollow" href="https://outgoing.prod.mozaws.net/v1/6c67e8b626205e8d96b2d0baae45371c6e78c868557026da755005d4e8e7a252/https%3A//download.mozilla.org/%3Fproduct=firefox-26.0&amp;os=osx&amp;lang=en-US">Firefox</a>\n\n<a rel="nofollow" href="https://outgoing.prod.mozaws.net/v1/39095e96302fa4a3ec79a21be70f48cc2e81264f2ac558b4ee3b1eee69401bb9/https%3A//download.mozilla.org/%3Fproduct=thunderbird-24.2.0&amp;os=osx&amp;lang=en-US">Thunderbird</a>\n\n<a rel="nofollow" href="https://outgoing.prod.mozaws.net/v1/0ccc94a0a65abe25cd784b751705b07f456f03363e6919bd64b537f8fd320fda/https%3A//download.mozilla.org/%3Fproduct=seamonkey-2.23&amp;os=osx&amp;lang=en-US">Seamonkey</a>\n\nElk downloaditem bevat de volgende elementen:\n\nU kunt ook rechtsklikken op elk downloaditem voor een contextmenu met meer actie en informatie zoals hieronder beschreven:\n<ul><li><b>Starten:</b> Opent het downloadbestand of voert het uit. Deze optie is beschikbaar na afronding van de download.</li><li><b>Bestand weergeven:</b> Geeft het downloadbestand weer in de bijbehorende map.</li><li><b>Beheerder weergeven:</b> Geeft het venster met de downloadgeschiedenis weer.</li><li><b>Virusscan:</b> Scant het gedownloade bestand automatisch met de opgegeven beveiligingssoftware. Deze optie vraagt u om beveiligingssoftware aan te geven als dit nog niet is gebeurd.</li><li><b>Checksum:</b> Opent een venster met de checksum waar u de MD5-, MD2-, SHA1-, SHA256-, SHA384- en SHA512-waarden voor het gedownloade bestand kunt berekenen en vergelijken.</li><li><b>Hernoemen:</b> Opent een venster Hernoemen waarmee u het gedownloade bestand kunt hernoemen. Deze optie is beschikbaar na afronding van de download.</li><li><b>Bestand verwijderen:</b> Verwijdert het gedownloade bestand van uw computer. Er wordt om bevestiging gevraagd voordat wordt geprobeerd het bestand te verwijderen. Deze optie is beschikbaar na afronding van de download.</li><li><b>Naar downloadpagina:</b> Opent de downloadpagina in een nieuw tabblad.</li><li><b>Downloadkoppeling kopiëren:</b> Kopieert de download-URL naar het klembord.</li><li><b>Annuleren:</b> Annuleert de actieve download en verwijdert het downloadbestand van uw computer. Deze optie is beschikbaar voor downloads die worden uitgevoerd.</li><li><b>Pauzeren:</b> Pauzeert de actieve download.</li><li><b>Hervatten:</b> Hervat de gepauzeerde download.</li><li><b>Wissen:</b> Verwijdert het downloaditem uit de downloadbalk.</li></ul>U kunt ook elk downloaditem aanklikken om een informatievenster te openen voor de desbetreffende download, zoals hieronder beschreven:\n<ul><li><b>Bron:</b> Bron-URL van het downloadbestand. Aanklikken van de bronkoppeling opent de bron-URL als een nieuw tabblad in de browser. Rechtklikken van de bronkoppeling opent het menu Kopiëren om de bron-URL van de download te kopiëren.</li><li><b>Doel:</b> Locatie waar het gedownloade bestand op uw computer wordt opgeslagen. Klikken op de doelkoppeling opent het downloadbestand in de bijbehorende map. Rechtklikken van de doelkoppeling opent het menu Kopiëren om het bestandspad van het downloadbestand te kopiëren.</li><li><b>Huidige snelheid:</b> Huidige downloadsnelheid van de actieve download in KB/s.</li><li><b>Gemiddelde snelheid:</b> Gemiddelde downloadsnelheid van de afgeronde download in KB/s. Deze informatie is beschikbaar na afronding van de download.</li><li><b>Voortgang:</b> Voltooiingspercentage van de download.</li><li><b>Resterende tijd:</b> Resterende tijd voor afronding van de download.</li><li><b>Downloadtijd:</b> Downloadtijd. Deze informatie is beschikbaar na afronding van de download.</li><li><b>Gedownload:</b> De eerste sectie van dit veld geeft Huidig aantal bytes weer, wat het aantal bytes is dat momenteel wordt overgedragen, terwijl de tweede sectie Totaal aantal bytes aangeeft, wat het totaal aantal bytes is dat overgedragen moet worden voordat de download is afgerond.</li><li><b>Bestandsgrootte:</b> Bestandsgrootte van de download. Deze informatie is beschikbaar na afronding van de download.</li><li><b>MD5-hash:</b> Automatisch berekende MD5-hash van het gedownloade bestand. Deze informatie is beschikbaar na afronding van de download.</li></ul>De Informatiepop-up bevat ook een voorbeeldfunctie voor gedownloade afbeeldingen om ze te kunnen bekijken als miniaturen. De voorbeeldfunctie ondersteunt bestanden van het type PNG, JPG en BMP. Klikken op een miniatuur opent het gedownloade bestand in de browser als een nieuw tabblad.\n\nU kunt als u snel downloaddetails wilt weten ook een downloaditem aanwijzen om een tooltip met informatie te openen.\n\n<b>Tip:</b> Dubbelklikken van een downloaditem start het gedownloade bestand automatisch.\n\n<b>Tip:</b> Dubbelklikken op de downloadbalk wist automatisch alle afgeronde downloads.\n\n<b>Tip:</b> Middelklikken op een downloaditem verwijdert deze van de downloadbalk.\n\n<b>Tip:</b> Klikken op een lege ruimte in de downloadbalk opent het contextmenu van de add-on.\n\nU kunt Download Status Bar naar wens aanpassen in het optiesvenster. U kunt het optiesvenster openen door te rechtsklikken op de knop Downloads en het menu Opties te selecteren. Als alternatief kunt u op het menu Extra in Firefox klikken, dan naar Add-ons gaan, Download Status Bar in het tabblad Extensies zoeken en op de knop Voorkeuren klikken om het optiesvenster te openen. Beschikbare opties zijn hieronder beschreven:\n<ul><li><b>Downloaditem wissen na starten:</b> Door deze optie aan te vinken wordt een downloaditem automatisch uit de downloadbalk verwijderd als u het bestand start via de optie Starten in het contextmenu of door dubbelklikken op het downloaditem.</li><li><b>Downloaditem wissen na weergave:</b> Door deze optie aan te vinken wordt het downloaditem automatisch uit de downloadbalk verwijderd na weergeven van het downloadbestand in de bijbehorende map.</li><li><b>Downloadmap automatisch openen als download is afgerond:</b> Door deze optie aan te vinken opent de downloadmap automatisch nadat de download is afgerond.</li><li><b>Downloadtabblad automatisch openen als download start:</b> Door deze optie aan te vinken opent het downloadtabblad bij starten van een download automatisch in de browser.</li><li><b>Afgeronde downloads opruimen als Firefox afsluit:</b> Download Status Bar houdt de geschiedenis van uw downloads uit vorige sessies bij en geeft ze weer in de downloadbalk als de nieuwe sessie start. Als u de downloadgeschiedenis niet in de downloadbalk wilt bewaren, dan kunt u deze optie aanvinken om downloaditems automatisch uit de geschiedenis te verwijderen bij afsluiten van Firefox.</li><li><b>Bevestiging vragen voor verwijdering gedownload bestand:</b> Voordat een downloaditem wordt verwijdert vraagt Download Status Bar om bevestiging om ongewilde verwijdering te voorkomen. Als u dit bevestigingsvenster niet wilt zien om zo het verwijderingsproces te versnellen, dan kunt u deze optie uitvinken.</li><li><b>Downloadbalk automatisch sluiten als alle downloads zijn afgerond:</b> Door deze optie aan te vinken behoudt u de downloadbalk als er actieve downloads zijn, maar wordt deze automatisch verborgen als alle downloads zijn afgerond, om zo meer van een webpagina weer te kunnen geven. U kunt ook een tijdsinterval voordat de downloadbalk automatisch wordt verborgen instellen.</li><li><b>Deze bestandstypes automatisch wissen:</b> U vindt wellicht bepaalde bestandstypes niet belangrijk om in de downloadbalk te houden en wilt deze wellicht automatisch na een bepaald tijdsinterval verwijderen. U kunt de te verwijderen bestandsextensies in dit veld opgeven, gescheiden door komma’s. Het teken ‘*’ betekent in dit veld een wildcard voor alle bestandstypes.</li></ul><b>Virusscan</b>\n\nU kunt automatisch gedownloade bestanden scannen door de velden in deze optiegroep in te stellen.\n<ul><li><b>Pad naar virusscanner:</b> Locatie waar de beveiligingssoftware van uw voorkeur te vinden is op uw computer. Klik Zoeken om een Bestandskiezer te open en beveiligingssoftware voor virusscannen toe te wijzen als dit nog niet is gebeurd.</li><li><b>Scan voor deze bestandstypes uitschakelen:</b> Als u automatisch virusscannen voor bepaalde bestandstypes wilt overslaan, dan kunt u in dit veld hun bestandsextensies intypen, gescheiden door komma’s.</li><li><b>Argumenten:</b> De meeste beveiligingssoftware heeft geen aanvullende argumenten voor virusscans nodig, dus u kunt deze sectie standaard leeg laten. Als uw beveiligingssoftware aanvullende argumenten nodig heeft, dan kunt u deze in dit veld intypen. U kunt de expressie %1 als plaatshouder voor de bestandslocatie van het gedownloade bestand.</li><li><b>Gedownloade bestanden automatisch scannen:</b> Door deze optie aan te vinken worden gedownloade bestanden na afronding automatisch door uw beveiligingssoftware gescand.</li></ul><b>Bericht</b>\n\nU kunt geluidsberichten krijgen bij afronden van downloads door de velden in deze optiegroep in te stellen.\n<ul><li><b>Pad naar geluidsbestand:</b> Locatie waar het notificatiegeluid van uw voorkeur te vinden is op uw computer. Klik Zoeken om een Bestandskiezer te open en een notificatiegeluid toe te wijzen als dit nog niet is gebeurd. Toe te wijzen geluidsbestanden dienen van het type .ogg, .wav of .mp3 te zijn. Het standaardgeluid is het geluid dat met Download Status Bar wordt meegeleverd.</li><li><b>Voorbeeldgeluid:</b> Als u het huidige notificatiegeluid wilt beluisteren kunt u op de knop Afspelen van de mediaspeler drukken om een voorbeeld te horen.</li><li><b>Geluid afspelen als download is afgerond:</b> Door deze optie aan te vinken ontvangt u geluidsnotificaties na afronden van downloads.</li><li><b>Instellingen resetten:</b> Door op de knop Instellingen resetten te klikken worden de waarden voor de notificatie-opties gereset.</li></ul><b>Weergave</b>\n\nU kunt de interface van Download Status Bar aanpassen middels de opties in dit tabblad.\n\n<b>Kleur</b>\n\nU kunt de weergave van downloaditems wijzigen door de kleurkiezers in deze optiegroep af te stemmen. Elke kleur verloopt om een mooi effect op de interface-elementen te creëren. Elke kleurwijziging wordt direct toegepast door Download Status Bar:\n<ul><li><b>Achtergrondkleur download:</b> Kies een speciale kleur in de desbetreffende kleurkiezer om een kleur aan de achtergrond van een downloaditem toe te wijzen. Omdat voortgangskleur de voorkeur krijgt boven de achtergrond van een downloaditem na afronden van de download, kunt u deze kleur wijzigen als u een groot bestand gaat downloaden om te zien hoe de kleur er uit ziet.</li><li><b>Kleur downloadvoortgang:</b> Kies een speciale kleur in de desbetreffende kleurkiezer om een voortgangskleur aan de actieve downloads toe te wijzen.</li><li><b>Kleur downloadtekst:</b> Kies een speciale kleur in de desbetreffende kleurkiezer om deze als tekstkleur voor de bestandsnaam en de voortgangssectie van een downloaditem toe te wijzen.</li><li><b>Kleur download afgerond:</b> Kies een speciale kleur in de desbetreffende kleurkiezer om deze als kleur voor afgeronde downloads toe te wijzen.</li><li><b>Kleur gepauzeerde download:</b> Kies een speciale kleur in de desbetreffende kleurkiezer om deze als kleur voor gepauzeerde downloads aan te geven.</li><li><b>Kleur achtergrond:</b> Kies een speciale kleur in de desbetreffende kleurkiezer om deze als achterkleur voor de downloadbalk in te stellen.</li><li><b>Instellingen resetten:</b> Door op de knop Instellingen resetten te klikken worden de kleurwaarden gereset.</li></ul><b>Downloadsnelheid</b>\n\nU kunt verschillende kleuren voor verschillende downloadsnelheden instellen door de velden in deze optiegroep in te stellen. Snelheidskleuren krijgen de voorkeur boven de voortgangskleur in de Kleuroptiegroep als u deze hebt ingesteld.\n\n<b>Gebruikersinterface</b>\n\nU kunt de interface van Download Status Bar wijzigen middels de velden in deze optiegroep:\n<ul><li><b>Downloadbalk:</b> Dit is de standaard downloadinterface voor Download Status Bar. Als u deze optie selecteert worden downloaditems in de downloadbalk onderin de browser geplaatst.</li><li><b>Downloadpaneel:</b> Als u uw downloads privé wilt houden kunt u deze optie om alle downloaditems in een werkbalkknoppaneel te plaatsen selecteren. De werkbalkknop wordt standaard in de add-onbalk geplaatst. Als er geen add-onbalk is of als de add-onbalk is verborgen, dan wordt de werkbalkknop in de navigatiebalk van Firefox geplaatst. De werkbalkknop is voorzien van een teller. De eerste sectie van de teller geeft het aantal actieve downloads weer, de tweede sectie geeft het aantal afgeronde downloads weer.</li></ul><b>Voortgangsnotificaties</b>\n\nU kunt de items Voortgangspercentage, Snelheid en Resterende tijd in de voortgangssectie van downloaditems verbergen of weergeven door de velden in deze optiegroep in te stellen.\n\n<b>Voortgangsuitlijning</b>\n\nU kunt de uitlijning van de voortgangssectie van downloaditems bijstellen door de velden van deze optiegroep in te stellen. De optie Horizontaal plaatst voortgang, snelheid en resterende tijd naast elkaar, terwijl Verticaal deze elementen in verticale positie plaatst.\n\n<b>Downloaditem</b>\n\nU kunt de breedte en hoogte van een downloaditem wijzigen door de velden in deze optiegroep in te stellen:\n<ul><li><b>Breedte:</b> Zet een numerieke waarde in dit veld voor de breedte van het downloaditem.</li><li><b>Hoogte:</b> Zet een numerieke waarde in dit veld voor de hoogte van het downloaditem.</li><li><b>Lettergrootte bestandsnaam:</b> Zet een numerieke waarde in dit veld om de lettergrootte voor de bestandsnaam van het downloaditem in te stellen.</li><li><b>Lettergrootte voortgang:</b> Zet een numerieke waarde in dit veld om de lettergrootte voor de voortgangssectie van het downloaditem in te stellen.</li></ul><b>Knop Wissen in downloadbalk verbergen:</b> Door deze optie aan te vinken wordt de knop Wissen op de downloadbalk verborgen.\n\n<b>Knop Downloads downloadbalk verbergen:</b> Door deze optie aan te vinken wordt de knop Downloaden in de downloadbalk verborgen.\n\nDeze pagina is ook beschikbaar in andere talen:\n\n<a rel="nofollow" href="https://addons.mozilla.org/de/firefox/addon/download-status-bar/" title="Duits">de - Japans</a>\n<a rel="nofollow" href="https://addons.mozilla.org/mk-MK/firefox/addon/download-status-bar/" title="Macedonisch">mk-MK - Macedonisch</a>\n<a rel="nofollow" href="https://addons.mozilla.org/nl/firefox/addon/download-status-bar/" title="Nederlands">nl - Nederlands</a>\n<a rel="nofollow" href="https://addons.mozilla.org/pl/firefox/addon/download-status-bar/" title="Pools">pl - Pools</a>\n<a rel="nofollow" href="https://addons.mozilla.org/pt-BR/firefox/addon/download-status-bar/" title="Portugees (Braziliaans)">pt-BR - Portugees (Braziliaans)</a>\n<a rel="nofollow" href="https://addons.mozilla.org/ro/firefox/addon/download-status-bar/" title="Roemeens">ro - Roemeens</a>\n<a rel="nofollow" href="https://addons.mozilla.org/ru/firefox/addon/download-status-bar/" title="Russisch">ru - Russisch</a>\n<a rel="nofollow" href="https://addons.mozilla.org/sv-SE/firefox/addon/download-status-bar/" title="Zweeds">sv-SE - Zweeds</a>\n<a rel="nofollow" href="https://addons.mozilla.org/tr/firefox/addon/download-status-bar/" title="Turks">tr - Turks</a>\n<a rel="nofollow" href="https://addons.mozilla.org/zh-CN/firefox/addon/download-status-bar/" title="Chinees (vereenvoudigd)">zh-CN - Chinees (vereenvoudigd)</a>\n<a rel="nofollow" href="https://addons.mozilla.org/zh-TW/firefox/addon/download-status-bar/" title="Chinees (traditioneel)">zh-TW - Chinees (traditioneel)</a>\n\n<i>Deze pagina zal over enkele dagen volledig vertaald zijn in uw eigen taal. Bedankt voor uw begrip en geduld.</i>\n\nIf you wish to see Download Status Bar in your own language, please feel free to translate it in <b>Babelzilla</b>.\n\n<a rel="nofollow" href="https://outgoing.prod.mozaws.net/v1/4b280a826a0133a76b2766145fdfc4632e8e08769ec15d98a7f72bbdd5bb4b2d/http%3A//www.babelzilla.org/index.php%3Foption=com_wts&amp;extension=5704&amp;type=show">http://www.babelzilla.org/index.php?option=com_wts&amp;extension=5704&amp;type=show</a>\n\n+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++\n\nYou can get more detailed support from Mozillazine topic:\n<a rel="nofollow" href="https://outgoing.prod.mozaws.net/v1/88aabce9cf880221d6d8b1b9a2fd1cc87fab041d922595e782726a99d4ba5883/http%3A//forums.mozillazine.org/viewtopic.php%3Ff=48&amp;t=2782661">http://forums.mozillazine.org/viewtopic.php?f=48&amp;t=2782661</a>',
     'pt-PT':
      'Download Status Bar manages every aspect of your downloads (<strong>Launch</strong>, <strong>Show</strong>, <strong>Scan</strong>, <strong>Rename</strong>, <strong>Checksum</strong>, <strong>Pause</strong>, <strong>Resume</strong>, <strong>Cancel</strong>, <strong>Clean</strong>, <strong>Delete</strong>), generates Statistics from your Download actions, keeps the History of your previous session downloads and much more. It is not only a download management add-on but a helper tool for boosting your Productivity, too.\n\nDownload Status Bar is specially designed by your needs and requests and all your expectations are placed in the core center of the add-on while utilizing the newest Firefox 26 features to improve performance of your browser and downloads. Download Status Bar is a project driven and managed by its own users which keeps it fresh and powerful.\n\nGet a copy of Download Status Bar to take total control over your Downloads.\n\nThis page is also available in other languages:\n\n<a rel="nofollow" href="https://addons.mozilla.org/de/firefox/addon/download-status-bar/" title="German">de - German</a>\n<a rel="nofollow" href="https://addons.mozilla.org/en-GB/firefox/addon/download-status-bar/" title="English (Great Britain)">en-GB - English (Great Britain)</a>\n<a rel="nofollow" href="https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/download-status-bar/" title="English (United States of America)">en-US - English (United States of America)</a>\n<a rel="nofollow" href="https://addons.mozilla.org/fi-FI/firefox/addon/download-status-bar/" title="Finnish">fi-FI - Finnish</a>\n<a rel="nofollow" href="https://addons.mozilla.org/fr/firefox/addon/download-status-bar/" title="French">fr - French</a>\n<a rel="nofollow" href="https://addons.mozilla.org/hu/firefox/addon/download-status-bar/" title="Hungarian">hu - Hungarian</a>\n<a rel="nofollow" href="https://addons.mozilla.org/it/firefox/addon/download-status-bar/" title="Italian">it - Italian</a>\n<a rel="nofollow" href="https://addons.mozilla.org/ja-JP/firefox/addon/download-status-bar/" title="Japanese">ja-JP - Japanese</a>\n<a rel="nofollow" href="https://addons.mozilla.org/nl/firefox/addon/download-status-bar/" title="Dutch">nl - Dutch</a>\n<a rel="nofollow" href="https://addons.mozilla.org/pl/firefox/addon/download-status-bar/" title="Polish">pl - Polish</a>\n<a rel="nofollow" href="https://addons.mozilla.org/pt-BR/firefox/addon/download-status-bar/" title="Portuguese (Brazilian)">pt-BR - Portuguese (Brazilian)</a>\n<a rel="nofollow" href="https://addons.mozilla.org/ro/firefox/addon/download-status-bar/" title="Romanian">ro - Romanian</a>\n<a rel="nofollow" href="https://addons.mozilla.org/ru/firefox/addon/download-status-bar/" title="Russian">ru - Russian</a>\n<a rel="nofollow" href="https://addons.mozilla.org/sv-SE/firefox/addon/download-status-bar/" title="Swedish">sv-SE - Swedish</a>\n<a rel="nofollow" href="https://addons.mozilla.org/tr/firefox/addon/download-status-bar/" title="Turkish">tr - Turkish</a>\n<a rel="nofollow" href="https://addons.mozilla.org/zh-CN/firefox/addon/download-status-bar/" title="Chinese (Simplified)">zh-CN - Chinese (Simplified)</a>\n<a rel="nofollow" href="https://addons.mozilla.org/zh-TW/firefox/addon/download-status-bar/" title="Chinese (Traditional)">zh-TW - Chinese (Traditional)</a>\n\nWhen you download files from Internet, Download Status Bar will automatically place progress items in the Download Bar for you. As the name suggest, Download Bar is the bar which is at bottom section of Firefox generally above Add-on Bar. Because Download Status Bar is user friendly and smart enough, Download Bar will only be visible when there is an active download. If there is no download to show, Download Bar hides itself automatically to preserve the web page area for you. And it will show itself again automatically when you start downloading any file from the web.\n\nBut if you want to view Download Bar even if there is no download, you can use below keyboard short-cuts:\n\n<b>Windows: CTRL + ALT + D</b>\n\n<b>Mac OS X: CMD + ALT + D</b>\n\n<b>Linux: (CTRL/CMD) + ALT + D</b>\n\nAlso you can use above keyboard short-cuts to hide Download Bar any time you wish. In other words those short-cuts work to toggle Download Bar for you.\n\n<i>This page will be completely translated into your own language in a few days. Thank you for your understanding and patience.</i>\n\n<b>Features</b>\n\n✓ Automatically close download bar when all downloads completed\n✓ Open download directory when the download is completed \n✓ Clear the download item after launching it\n✓ Clear the download item after showing file\n✓ Download Progress Color\n✓ Download Text Color\n✓ Manual Virus Scan\n✓ Automatic Virus Scan\n✓ Disable virus scan for certain file types\n✓ Double Click on download item will Launch the download file\n✓ Open Download Tab\n✓ Options reachable as Add-on Preferences in Tools / Add-ons / Download Status Bar\n✓ Last Clear will auto close Download Bar\n✓ Key to toggle Download Bar = CTRL + ALT + D for Windows /  CMD + ALT + D for Mac \n✓ Go to Download Page\n✓ Copy Download Link\n✓ Download Complete Color\n✓ Play notification sound (supports .ogg, .wav, .mp3 file types)\n✓ Pause/Start/Cancel buttons\n✓ Delete File\n✓ Double click on empty bar space will auto clear completed download items\n✓ Download Speed Color + 4 customizable color\n✓ Download Background Color\n✓ Tools menu option to toggle Download Status Bar\n✓ Flexible Download items\n✓ Download width can be set to a fixed value\n✓ Wildcard support for Auto Clear\n✓ Reset Color Settings\n✓ Right click on empty bar space will show Add-on Menu\n✓ Left Click on download item will show download Information Panel\n✓ Auto Close for Wildcard Clear\n✓ Reset Settings for Notification Sound\n✓ Last Launch will auto close Download Bar\n✓ Last Show File will auto close Download Bar\n✓ Download Panel for Add-on Bar\n✓ Middle click on Download item will clear it\n✓ Clear Button\n✓ Progress percentage, Speed and Remaining time as Progress Notification can be customizable.\n✓ Flash Video Downloader support\n✓ Download Item Width &amp; Height set\n✓ Auto open Download Tab when a Download starts\n✓ Hide Clear Button option\n✓ Mouseover on Download item will open Information Tooltip\n✓ Hide Downloads Button\n✓ Rename File\n✓ Pause All Downloads\n✓ Resume All Downloads\n✓ Cancel All Downloads\n✓ On the fly Option change feature\n✓ Previewing downloaded image files in Information Popup\n✓ Target entry in Information Popup shows File save location\n✓ Clicking Source entry in Information Popup opens it in New Tab\n✓ Clicking Target entry in Information Popup shows the Target file\n✓ Long Source entries are trimmed in Information Popup\n✓ Hovering Source and Target entries shows tooltip\n✓ Downloaded entry in Information Popup shows downloaded bytes\n✓ Preview completed Image files (supports PNG, GIF, JPG, BMP) in Information Popup \n✓ Clicking on preview image opens it in New Tab\n✓ Icons for Context Menus\n✓ Movable Panel can be pinned to Navigation Toolbar\n✓ Drag n Drop Download item will copy file into target folder\n✓ Privacy window support\n✓ Download Counter for Toolbar button\n✓ Porting downloads between Bar and Panel\n✓ Options Windows auto focus\n✓ Download Pause Color\n✓ Bar Background Color\n✓ Drag n Drop after Download complete\n✓ History feature. Download Status Bar will remember downloaded files across sessions.\n✓ Open Download Tab only utilizes one tab\n✓ Case insensitivity for file extensions\n✓ Gradient Color for Interface Elements (Download background, progress, complete, pause and speed color can be styled with a linear gradient rather than flat color)\n✓ Arguments for Virus Scanner\n✓ Delete File Warning\n✓ Bar Background Color now has gradient\n✓ Clean completed Downloads when Firefox quits\n✓ Progress Notifications (Progress, Speed and Remaining Time) can be shown/hidden\n✓ 4 color for Download Speed\n✓ Resume context option\n✓ Closing download bar automatically after specific time. This new option is placed above Auto Clear option in Options window.\n✓ MD5 Hash feature in Information Popup.\n✓ Preview for JPEG file.\n✓ "Ask confirmation before deleting downloaded file" option \n✓ Checksum Window to calculate MD5, MD2, SHA1, SHA256, SHA384, SHA512 and compare.\n✓ Statistics Page which is accessible from Add-on context menu\n✓ Vertical/Horizontal Progress Notifications\n✓ Font Size for File Name and Progress Notifications\n\n✓ Locale en-US\n✓ Locale fi-FI Finnish\n✓ Locale de German\n✓ Locale it Italian\n✓ Locale nl Dutch\n✓ Locale pl Polish\n✓ Locale sv-SE Swedish\n✓ Locale zh-CN Chinese (Simplified)\n✓ Locale zh-TW Chinese (Traditional) \n✓ Locale pt-BR Portuguese (Brazilian)\n✓ Locale tr Turkish\n✓ Locale hu Hungarian\n✓ Locale ro Romanian\n✓ Locale ja-JP Japanese\n✓ Locale ru Russian\n✓ Locale fr French\n\nIf you wish to see Download Status Bar in your own language, please feel free to translate it in <b>Babelzilla</b>.\n\n<a rel="nofollow" href="https://outgoing.prod.mozaws.net/v1/4b280a826a0133a76b2766145fdfc4632e8e08769ec15d98a7f72bbdd5bb4b2d/http%3A//www.babelzilla.org/index.php%3Foption=com_wts&amp;extension=5704&amp;type=show">http://www.babelzilla.org/index.php?option=com_wts&amp;extension=5704&amp;type=show</a>\n\n+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++\n\nYou can get more detailed support from Mozillazine topic:\n<a rel="nofollow" href="https://outgoing.prod.mozaws.net/v1/88aabce9cf880221d6d8b1b9a2fd1cc87fab041d922595e782726a99d4ba5883/http%3A//forums.mozillazine.org/viewtopic.php%3Ff=48&amp;t=2782661">http://forums.mozillazine.org/viewtopic.php?f=48&amp;t=2782661</a>',
     'zh-TW':
      'Download Status Bar 管理你的下載的每個方面。 (<strong>啟動</strong>, <strong>顯示</strong>, <strong>掃瞄</strong>, <strong>重新命名</strong>, <strong>總和檢查</strong>, <strong>暫停</strong>, <strong>續傳</strong>, <strong>取消</strong>, <strong>清除</strong>, <strong>刪除</strong>), 從你的下載動作產生統計數據，保留你先前的下載記錄以及更多。這並不只是一個下載管理的附加元件，亦同時是一個提升你生產力的輔助工具。\n\nDownload Status Bar 是特別以你的需求和請求來設計，利用最新的 Firefox 26 特點來改善你的瀏覽器效能和下載效能的同時，你的所有期望已安放於本附加元件的核心之中。 Download Status Bar 是一個由它的使用者驅動和管理的計劃，從而保持它新穎和強大。\n\n取得一份 Download Status Bar 的副本來完全控制你的下載。\n\n<b>功能</b>\n\n✓ Supports Firefox 26, Firefox 28, Firefox Australis and Firefox 31\n✓ Supports Firefox 25, Firefox 24 ESR and Firefox 24 Before\n✓ Supports Pale Moon\n✓ Automatically close download bar when all downloads completed\n✓ Open download directory when the download is completed\n✓ Clear the download item after launching it\n✓ Clear the download item after showing file\n✓ Download Progress Color\n✓ Download Text Color\n✓ Manual Virus Scan\n✓ Automatic Virus Scan\n✓ Disable virus scan for certain file types\n✓ Double Click on download item will Launch the download file\n✓ Open Download Tab\n✓ Options reachable as Add-on Preferences in Tools / Add-ons / Download Status Bar\n✓ Last Clear will auto close Download Bar\n✓ Key to toggle Download Bar = CTRL + ALT + D for Windows / CMD + ALT + D for Mac\n✓ Go to Download Page\n✓ Copy Download Link\n✓ Download Complete Color\n✓ Play notification sound (supports .ogg, .wav, .mp3 file types)\n✓ Pause/Start/Cancel buttons\n✓ Delete File\n✓ Double click on empty bar space will auto clear completed download items\n✓ Download Speed Color + 4 customizable color\n✓ Download Background Color\n✓ Tools menu option to toggle Download Status Bar\n✓ Flexible Download items\n✓ Download width can be set to a fixed value\n✓ Wildcard support for Auto Clear\n✓ Reset Color Settings\n✓ Right click on empty bar space will show Add-on Menu\n✓ Left Click on download item will show download Information Panel\n✓ Auto Close for Wildcard Clear\n✓ Reset Settings for Notification Sound\n✓ Last Launch will auto close Download Bar\n✓ Last Show File will auto close Download Bar\n✓ Download Panel for Add-on Bar\n✓ Middle click on Download item will clear it\n✓ Clear Button\n✓ Progress percentage, Speed and Remaining time as Progress Notification can be customizable.\n✓ Flash Video Downloader support\n✓ Download Item Width &amp; Height set\n✓ Auto open Download Tab when a Download starts\n✓ Hide Clear Button option\n✓ Mouseover on Download item will open Information Tooltip\n✓ Hide Downloads Button\n✓ Rename File\n✓ Pause All Downloads\n✓ Resume All Downloads\n✓ Cancel All Downloads\n✓ On the fly Option change feature\n✓ Previewing downloaded image files in Information Popup\n✓ Target entry in Information Popup shows File save location\n✓ Clicking Source entry in Information Popup opens it in New Tab\n✓ Clicking Target entry in Information Popup shows the Target file\n✓ Long Source entries are trimmed in Information Popup\n✓ Hovering Source and Target entries shows tooltip\n✓ Downloaded entry in Information Popup shows downloaded bytes\n✓ Preview completed Image files (supports PNG, GIF, JPG, BMP) in Information Popup\n✓ Clicking on preview image opens it in New Tab\n✓ Icons for Context Menus\n✓ Movable Panel can be pinned to Navigation Toolbar\n✓ Drag n Drop Download item will copy file into target folder\n✓ Privacy window support\n✓ Download Counter for Toolbar button\n✓ Porting downloads between Bar and Panel\n✓ Options Windows auto focus\n✓ Download Pause Color\n✓ Bar Background Color\n✓ Drag n Drop after Download complete\n✓ History feature. Download Status Bar will remember downloaded files across sessions.\n✓ Open Download Tab only utilizes one tab\n✓ Case insensitivity for file extensions\n✓ Gradient Color for Interface Elements (Download background, progress, complete, pause and speed color can be styled with a linear gradient rather than flat color)\n✓ Arguments for Virus Scanner\n✓ Delete File Warning\n✓ Bar Background Color now has gradient\n✓ Clean completed Downloads when Firefox quits\n✓ Progress Notifications (Progress, Speed and Remaining Time) can be shown/hidden\n✓ 4 color for Download Speed\n✓ Resume context option\n✓ Closing download bar automatically after specific time. This new option is placed above Auto Clear option in Options window.\n✓ MD5 Hash feature in Information Popup.\n✓ Preview for JPEG file.\n✓ "Ask confirmation before deleting downloaded file" option\n✓ Checksum Window to calculate MD5, MD2, SHA1, SHA256, SHA384, SHA512 and compare.\n✓ Statistics Page which is accessible from Add-on context menu\n✓ Vertical/Horizontal Progress Notifications\n✓ Font Size for File Name and Progress Notifications\n✓ Help Page contains full tutorial for Download Status Bar. (Right click Downloads button and select Help option from context menu to open up Help Page)\n✓ Rename Window Interface Update. (It is quicker to rename file now by separated File Name and Extension textboxes.)\n✓ Double Click functionality for Download Item can be set to either Launch or Show File via Options Window. It is placed under "Ask confirmation before deleting downloaded file".\n✓ Keyboard short-cut change via "extensions.downloadbar.shortcutkey" preference if you have a conflicting short-cut. You need to restart Firefox for the new short-cut.\n✓ "Send to" feature to send files to selected folders. Defaults are Desktop and Downloads directory and you can also chose another directory by Custom option.\n\n✓ Locale en-US\n✓ Locale fi-FI Finnish\n✓ Locale de German\n✓ Locale it Italian\n✓ Locale nl Dutch\n✓ Locale pl Polish\n✓ Locale sv-SE Swedish\n✓ Locale zh-CN Chinese (Simplified)\n✓ Locale zh-TW Chinese (Traditional)\n✓ Locale pt-BR Portuguese (Brazilian)\n✓ Locale tr Turkish\n✓ Locale hu Hungarian\n✓ Locale ro Romanian\n✓ Locale ja-JP Japanese\n✓ Locale ru Russian\n✓ Locale fr French\n✓ Locale mk-MK Macedonian\n\nWhen you download files from Internet, Download Status Bar will automatically place progress items in the Download Bar for you. As the name suggest, Download Bar is the bar which is at bottom section of Firefox generally above Add-on Bar. Because Download Status Bar is user friendly and smart enough, Download Bar will only be visible when there is an active download. If there is no download to show, Download Bar hides itself automatically to preserve the web page area for you. And it will show itself again automatically when you start downloading any file from the web.\n\n不過，如果你想在沒有下載時檢視下載列，你可以使用下列的鍵盤快捷鍵：\n\n<b>Windows: CTRL + ALT + D</b>\n\n<b>Mac OS X: SHIFT + ALT + D</b>\n\n<b>Linux: (CTRL/CMD) + ALT + D</b>\n\nYou can also use above keyboard short-cuts to hide Download Bar any time you wish. In other words those short-cuts work to toggle Download Bar for you. As another option, you can toggle Download Bar by Download Status Bar menu option under Tools menu of Firefox.\n\nAfter you open up Download Bar, you will notice Downloads button on the left and Clear button on the right side of the bar. Downloads button is the main button of Download Status Bar add-on which you can click to open up Add-on Context Menu. Clear button is used to clear all completed downloads from Download Bar by a mouse click.\n\nClicking on Download button will provide Add-on Context Menu as described below:\n<ul><li><b>選項:</b> This menu option will open up add-on Options window where you can customise the add-on according to your needs.</li><li><b>統計:</b> This menu option will open up Statistics page which will generate Statistics details and graphs for your previous Download actions.</li><li><b>顯示下載記錄:</b> This menu option will open up default Firefox History Library in case you may want to refer to your Downloads as a list of window.</li><li><b>開啟下載分頁:</b> 此選單選項會以瀏覽分頁開啟預設 Firefox 記錄收藏庫。</li><li><b>下載:</b> This menu provides you Pause All Downloads, Resume All Downloads, Cancel All Downloads and Clear All Downloads options to manage your downloads in batch.</li><li><b>說明:</b> This menu option will open up Help page of Download Status Bar where you can get details about the add-on and how to use it in an efficient way.</li><li><b>關閉此列:</b> 此選單選項會為你關閉下載列。</li></ul>When you download files from web, Download Status Bar automatically places download items in Download Bar. Below are some example software from Mozilla to download. Click on them to start downloading.\n\n<a rel="nofollow" href="https://outgoing.prod.mozaws.net/v1/6c67e8b626205e8d96b2d0baae45371c6e78c868557026da755005d4e8e7a252/https%3A//download.mozilla.org/%3Fproduct=firefox-26.0&amp;os=osx&amp;lang=en-US">Firefox</a>\n\n<a rel="nofollow" href="https://outgoing.prod.mozaws.net/v1/39095e96302fa4a3ec79a21be70f48cc2e81264f2ac558b4ee3b1eee69401bb9/https%3A//download.mozilla.org/%3Fproduct=thunderbird-24.2.0&amp;os=osx&amp;lang=en-US">Thunderbird</a>\n\n<a rel="nofollow" href="https://outgoing.prod.mozaws.net/v1/0ccc94a0a65abe25cd784b751705b07f456f03363e6919bd64b537f8fd320fda/https%3A//download.mozilla.org/%3Fproduct=seamonkey-2.23&amp;os=osx&amp;lang=en-US">Seamonkey</a>\n\n各個下載項目包含以下元素：\n\nYou can also right click on each download item to get a context menu for more actions and information which are described as below:\n<ul><li><b>啟動:</b> 開啟或執行下載的檔案。此選項將於下載完成後可用。</li><li><b>顯示檔案:</b> Shows the Download file in its containing folder.</li><li><b>顯示管理員:</b> 顯示下載記錄視窗。</li><li><b>病毒掃瞄:</b> Scans the download file manually with the Security Software you assigned. This option will ask you to locate and assign a Security Software if you did not assign already.</li><li><b>總和檢查:</b> Opens up Checksum window where you can calculate and compare MD5, MD2, SHA1, SHA256, SHA384, SHA512 values for the downloaded file.</li><li><b>重新命名:</b> Opens up Rename window to let you rename your downloaded file. This option will be available after download has completed.</li><li><b>刪除檔案:</b> Deletes downloaded file from your computer. It will ask you confirmation before attempting to delete the file. This option will be available after download has completed.</li><li><b>前往下載頁面:</b> 開啟下載頁面於新分頁。</li><li><b>複製下載鏈結:</b> 複製下載 URL 到剪貼簿。</li><li><b>取消:</b> Cancels the active download and removes the download file from your computer. This option is available for the downloads that are in progress.</li><li><b>暫停:</b> Pauses the active download.</li><li><b>續傳:</b> 續傳已暫停下載。</li><li><b>清除:</b> 從下載列清除下載項目。</li></ul>You can also left click on each download item to open up Information Popup for the related download which is described below in detail:\n<ul><li><b>來源:</b> Source URL of the download file. Left clicking on Source link will open up Source URL in browser as a new tab. Right clicking on Source link opens Copy menu to copy the Source URL of the download.</li><li><b>目標:</b> Location at which the downloaded file is stored on your computer. Left clicking on Target link will open up the download file in its containing folder. Right clicking on Target link opens Copy menu to copy the file path of the download file.</li><li><b>目前速度:</b> Current download speed of the active download in KB/s.</li><li><b>平均速度:</b> Average download speed of the completed download in KB/s. This information will be available after download has completed.</li><li><b>進度:</b> Progress percent completed for the download.</li><li><b>剩餘時間:</b> Remaining time to complete the download.</li><li><b>總下載時間:</b> Time spent to complete the download. This information will be available after download has completed.</li><li><b>已下載:</b> First section of this field indicates Current Bytes which is the number of bytes currently transferred while the second section indicates Total Bytes which is the total number of bytes to be transferred before the download finishes.</li><li><b>檔案大小:</b> Size of the download file on disk. This information will be available after download has completed.</li><li><b>MD5 雜湊:</b> Automatically calculated MD5 Hash of the downloaded file. This information will be available after download has completed.</li></ul>Information Popup also contains Preview feature for downloaded images to preview them as thumbnails. Preview feature supports PNG, JPG, GIF and BMP file types. Clicking on Preview thumbnail opens the dowmloaded image in the browser as a new tab.\n\nYou can also hover over a download item to open up Information Tooltip to get download details in a quick pace.\n\n<b>Tip:</b> Double clicking on download item will automatically Launch downloaded file.\n\n<b>Tip:</b> Double clicking on Download Bar automatically clears all completed downloads.\n\n<b>Tip:</b> Middle clicking on download item will clear it from Download Bar.\n\n<b>Tip:</b> Left clicking on empty space in Download Bar will open up Add-on Context Menu.\n\nYou can customise Download Status Bar according to your needs by the Options window. You can open up Options window by right clicking on Downloads button and selecting Options menu. As an alternative, you can click Tools from Firefox menu, then go to Add-ons, find Download Status Bar in the Extensions tab and click on Preferences button to open up Options window. Available options are described as below:\n<ul><li><b>啟動後清除該下載項目:</b> Checking this option will let you clear download item automatically from Download bar after you Launch the file either by context menu Launch option or simply double clicking on Download item.</li><li><b>顯示檔案後清除該下載項目:</b> Checking this option will let you clear download item automatically from Download bar after showing the download file in its containing folder.</li><li><b>下載完成後自動開啟檔案目錄:</b> Checking this option will let you open up Download directory automatically after the download completes.</li><li><b>下載開始時自動開啟下載分頁:</b> Checking this option will let you open up Download Tab automatically in the browser as a tab when a download starts.</li><li><b>離開 Firefox 時清除已完成下載:</b> Download Status Bar keeps the History of your downloads from previous session and shows them up in the Download Bar again when the new session starts. If you do not want to keep download History in Download Bar, you can check this option to clear Download items automatically from History when Firefox quits.</li><li><b>刪除已下載檔案之前進行詢問和確認:</b> Before deleting a download item, Download Status Bar ask confirmation to prevent unintended delete actions. If you do not want this confirmation window to speed up the delete process, you can uncheck this option.</li><li><b>所有下載完成時自動關閉下載列:</b> Checking this option will let you keep Download Bar when there are active Downloads but hide it automatically when all Downloads complete to preserve the web page area. You can also specify a time interval before the Download Bar automatically disappears. </li><li><b>自動清除這些檔案類型:</b> You may find some file types unimportant to keep in Download Bar and want to clear them automatically after a specific time interval. You can type the file extensions to clear in this field separated by commas. Having an * character in this field is meant to be a short-cut for all file types.</li></ul><b>病毒掃瞄</b>\n\nYou can automatically scan downloaded files by tuning the fields in this options group.\n<ul><li><b>病毒掃瞄器路徑:</b> Location at which your preferred Security Software is stored on your computer. Click Locate to open up File Picker to assign a Security Software for Virus Scan if you did not assign already.</li><li><b>停用掃瞄於這些檔案類型:</b> If you want to omit Automatic Virus Scanning for certain file types, you can type their file extensions in this field by comma separated.</li><li><b>參數:</b> Most of the Security Software does not need any additional arguments for Virus Scan so you can leave this section empty as default. If your Security Software needs additional arguments you can type in this field. You can use %1 expression as a placeholder for the file location of downloaded file.</li><li><b>自動掃瞄已下載檔案:</b> Check this option to automatically scan downloaded files by your Security Software when the download completes.</li></ul><b>通知</b>\n\nYou can get sound notifications when downloads finish by tuning the fields in this options group.\n<ul><li><b>音訊檔案路徑:</b> Location at which your preferred Notification Sound is stored on your computer. Click Locate to open up File Picker to assign a Sound file for Notification if you did not assign already. Possible sound files that can be assigned as notification are .ogg, .wav and .mp3 file types. Default Sound is the notification sound which is included inside the Download Status Bar add-on.</li><li><b>預覽聲音:</b> If you want to listen to current Notification Sound, you can click play button of sound player to preview the assigned sound file.</li><li><b>下載完成時播放通知聲音:</b> Check this option if you want to get sound notifications when downloads are completed.</li><li><b>重設設定:</b> 按下重設設定按鈕會重設通知選項的數值。</li></ul><b>外觀</b>\n\n你可以使用此分頁提供的選項來自訂 Download Status Bar 的介面。\n\n<b>顏色</b>\n\nYou can change the appearance of Download Items by tuning the color pickers in this options group. Each color is gradient based to create a nice effect for the interface elements. Every color change is applied instantly by Download Status Bar:\n<ul><li><b>下載背景顏色:</b> Pick a special color from the related Color Picker to assign color for the background of Download Item. Because Progress color will superpose the background color of Download Item when the download finish, you may want to change this color when you start downloading a large file to be able to see how the color looks like.</li><li><b>下載進度顏色:</b> Pick a special color from the related Color Picker to assign it as progress color for the active Downloads. </li><li><b>下載文字顏色:</b> Pick a special color from the related Color Picker to assign it as text color for File Name and Progress Section of Download Item.</li><li><b>下載完成顏色:</b> Pick a special color from the related Color Picker to assign it as a color to indicate completed Downloads.</li><li><b>下載暫停顏色:</b> Pick a special color from the related Color Picker to assign it as a pause color to indicate paused Downloads.</li><li><b>下載列背景顏色:</b> Pick a special color from the related Color Picker to assign it as a background color for Download Bar.</li><li><b>重設設定:</b> 按下重設設定按鈕會重設顏色選項的數值。</li></ul><b>下載速度</b>\n\nYou can assign different colors for different download speeds by tuning the fields in this options group. Assigning Speed Colors will overwrite the Progress Color from the Color options group if you assigned any.\n\n<b>使用者介面</b>\n\nYou can change the interface of Download Status Bar by the fields provided in this options group:\n<ul><li><b>下載列:</b> This is the default download interface for Download Status Bar. If you select this option, Download Items are put in the Download Bar which is placed at the bottom section of the browser.</li><li><b>下載面板:</b> If you want to keep your Download privacy from others, you can select this option to place all Download Items in a Toolbar Button Panel. The Toolbar Button will be placed in Add-on Bar as default. If there are no Add-on Bar or if Add-on Bar is hidden at the moment, the Toolbar Button will be placed inside the Navigation Toolbar of Firefox. Toolbar Button has also a counter next to it. First section of counter indicates the number of active downloads in progress and the second part of the counter indicates the number of completed downloads.</li></ul><b>進度通知</b>\n\nYou can hide or show Progress Percent, Speed and Remaining Time items in the Progress Section of Download Items by tuning the checkboxes in this option group.\n\n<b>進度對齊</b>\n\nYou can adjust the Progress Section alignment of Download Items by tuning the fields of this options group. Selecting Horizontal option will place Progress, Speed and Remaining Time elements side by side while switching to Vertical place all Progress elements in vertical position.\n\n<b>下載項目</b>\n\nYou can change the width and height values of a Download item  by tuning the fields in this options group:\n<ul><li><b>寬度:</b> Place a numerical value in this field to set the width of the Download Item.</li><li><b>高度:</b> Place a numerical value in this field to set the height of the Download Item.</li><li><b>檔案名稱的文字大小:</b> Place a numerical value in this field to set the font size for the File Name of the Download Item.</li><li><b>進度的文字大小:</b> Place a numerical value in this field to set the font size for the Progress Section of the Download Item.</li></ul><b>隱藏下載列上的清除按鈕:</b> 選取此選項會隱藏下載列的清除按鈕。\n\n<b>隱藏下載列上的下載按鈕:</b> 選取此選項會隱藏下載列的下載按鈕。\n\n此頁面亦同時提供其他語言：\n\n<a rel="nofollow" href="https://addons.mozilla.org/de/firefox/addon/download-status-bar/" title="德文">de - 德文</a>\n<a rel="nofollow" href="https://addons.mozilla.org/en-GB/firefox/addon/download-status-bar/" title="英文 (大不列顛)">en-GB - 英文 (大不列顛)</a>\n<a rel="nofollow" href="https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/download-status-bar/" title="英文 (美利堅合眾國)">en-US - 英文 (美利堅合眾國)</a>\n<a rel="nofollow" href="https://addons.mozilla.org/es-MX/firefox/addon/download-status-bar/" title="Spanish (Mexico)">es-MX - Spanish (Mexico)</a>\n<a rel="nofollow" href="https://addons.mozilla.org/fi-FI/firefox/addon/download-status-bar/" title="芬蘭文">fi-FI - 芬蘭文</a>\n<a rel="nofollow" href="https://addons.mozilla.org/fr/firefox/addon/download-status-bar/" title="法文">fr - 法文</a>\n<a rel="nofollow" href="https://addons.mozilla.org/hu/firefox/addon/download-status-bar/" title="匈牙利文">hu - 匈牙利文</a>\n<a rel="nofollow" href="https://addons.mozilla.org/it/firefox/addon/download-status-bar/" title="義大利文">it - 義大利文</a>\n<a rel="nofollow" href="https://addons.mozilla.org/ja-JP/firefox/addon/download-status-bar/" title="日文">ja-JP - 日文</a>\n<a rel="nofollow" href="https://addons.mozilla.org/mk-MK/firefox/addon/download-status-bar/" title="馬其頓文">mk-MK - 馬其頓文</a>\n<a rel="nofollow" href="https://addons.mozilla.org/nl/firefox/addon/download-status-bar/" title="荷蘭文">nl - 荷蘭文</a>\n<a rel="nofollow" href="https://addons.mozilla.org/pl/firefox/addon/download-status-bar/" title="波蘭文">pl - 波蘭文</a>\n<a rel="nofollow" href="https://addons.mozilla.org/pt-BR/firefox/addon/download-status-bar/" title="葡萄牙文 (巴西)">pt-BR - 葡萄牙文 (巴西)</a>\n<a rel="nofollow" href="https://addons.mozilla.org/ro/firefox/addon/download-status-bar/" title="羅馬尼亞文">ro - 羅馬尼亞文</a>\n<a rel="nofollow" href="https://addons.mozilla.org/ru/firefox/addon/download-status-bar/" title="俄文">ru - 俄文</a>\n<a rel="nofollow" href="https://addons.mozilla.org/sv-SE/firefox/addon/download-status-bar/" title="瑞典文">sv-SE - 瑞典文</a>\n<a rel="nofollow" href="https://addons.mozilla.org/tr/firefox/addon/download-status-bar/" title="土耳其文">tr - 土耳其文</a>\n<a rel="nofollow" href="https://addons.mozilla.org/zh-CN/firefox/addon/download-status-bar/" title="中文 (簡體中文)">zh-CN - 中文 (簡體中文)</a>\n<a rel="nofollow" href="https://addons.mozilla.org/zh-TW/firefox/addon/download-status-bar/" title="中文 (正體中文)">zh-TW - 中文 (正體中文)</a>\n\n<i>此頁面將於數天內完全翻譯成你的語言。謝謝你的理解和耐心。</i>\n\nIf you wish to see Download Status Bar in your own language, please feel free to translate it in <b>Babelzilla</b>.\n\n<a rel="nofollow" href="https://outgoing.prod.mozaws.net/v1/4b280a826a0133a76b2766145fdfc4632e8e08769ec15d98a7f72bbdd5bb4b2d/http%3A//www.babelzilla.org/index.php%3Foption=com_wts&amp;extension=5704&amp;type=show">http://www.babelzilla.org/index.php?option=com_wts&amp;extension=5704&amp;type=show</a>\n\n+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++\n\nYou can get more detailed support from Mozillazine topic:\n<a rel="nofollow" href="https://outgoing.prod.mozaws.net/v1/88aabce9cf880221d6d8b1b9a2fd1cc87fab041d922595e782726a99d4ba5883/http%3A//forums.mozillazine.org/viewtopic.php%3Ff=48&amp;t=2782661">http://forums.mozillazine.org/viewtopic.php?f=48&amp;t=2782661</a>',
     'en-US':
      'Download Status Bar manages every aspect of your downloads (<strong>Launch</strong>, <strong>Show</strong>, <strong>Scan</strong>, <strong>Send To</strong>, <strong>Rename</strong>, <strong>Checksum</strong>, <strong>Pause</strong>, <strong>Resume</strong>, <strong>Cancel</strong>, <strong>Clean</strong>, <strong>Delete</strong>), generates Statistics from your Download actions, keeps the History of your previous session downloads and much more. It is not only a download management add-on but a helper tool for boosting your Productivity, too.\n\nDownload Status Bar is specially designed by your needs and requests and all your expectations are placed in the core center of the add-on while utilizing the newest Firefox 26 features to improve performance of your browser and downloads. Download Status Bar is a project driven and managed by its own users which keeps it fresh and powerful.\n\nGet a copy of Download Status Bar to take total control over your Downloads.\n\n<b>Features</b>\n\n✓ Supports Firefox 26, Firefox 28, Firefox Australis and Firefox 31\n✓ Supports Firefox 25, Firefox 24 ESR and Firefox 24 Before\n✓ Supports Thunderbird\n✓ Supports SeaMonkey\n✓ Supports Pale Moon\n✓ Automatically close download bar when all downloads completed\n✓ Open download directory when the download is completed\n✓ Clear the download item after launching it\n✓ Clear the download item after showing file\n✓ Download Progress Color\n✓ Download Text Color\n✓ Manual Virus Scan\n✓ Automatic Virus Scan\n✓ Disable virus scan for certain file types\n✓ Double Click on download item will Launch the download file\n✓ Open Download Tab\n✓ Options reachable as Add-on Preferences in Tools / Add-ons / Download Status Bar\n✓ Last Clear will auto close Download Bar\n✓ Key to toggle Download Bar = CTRL + ALT + D for Windows / CMD + ALT + D for Mac\n✓ Go to Download Page\n✓ Copy Download Link\n✓ Download Complete Color\n✓ Play notification sound (supports .ogg, .wav, .mp3 file types)\n✓ Pause/Start/Cancel buttons\n✓ Delete File\n✓ Double click on empty bar space will auto clear completed download items\n✓ Download Speed Color + 4 customizable color\n✓ Download Background Color\n✓ Tools menu option to toggle Download Status Bar\n✓ Flexible Download items\n✓ Download width can be set to a fixed value\n✓ Wildcard support for Auto Clear\n✓ Reset Color Settings\n✓ Right click on empty bar space will show Add-on Menu\n✓ Left Click on download item will show download Information Panel\n✓ Auto Close for Wildcard Clear\n✓ Reset Settings for Notification Sound\n✓ Last Launch will auto close Download Bar\n✓ Last Show File will auto close Download Bar\n✓ Download Panel for Add-on Bar\n✓ Middle click on Download item will clear it\n✓ Clear Button\n✓ Progress percentage, Speed and Remaining time as Progress Notification can be customizable.\n✓ Flash Video Downloader support\n✓ Download Item Width &amp; Height set\n✓ Auto open Download Tab when a Download starts\n✓ Hide Clear Button option\n✓ Mouseover on Download item will open Information Tooltip\n✓ Hide Downloads Button\n✓ Rename File\n✓ Pause All Downloads\n✓ Resume All Downloads\n✓ Cancel All Downloads\n✓ On the fly Option change feature\n✓ Previewing downloaded image files in Information Popup\n✓ Target entry in Information Popup shows File save location\n✓ Clicking Source entry in Information Popup opens it in New Tab\n✓ Clicking Target entry in Information Popup shows the Target file\n✓ Long Source entries are trimmed in Information Popup\n✓ Hovering Source and Target entries shows tooltip\n✓ Downloaded entry in Information Popup shows downloaded bytes\n✓ Preview completed Image files (supports PNG, GIF, JPG, BMP) in Information Popup\n✓ Clicking on preview image opens it in New Tab\n✓ Icons for Context Menus\n✓ Movable Panel can be pinned to Navigation Toolbar\n✓ Drag n Drop Download item will copy file into target folder\n✓ Privacy window support\n✓ Download Counter for Toolbar button\n✓ Porting downloads between Bar and Panel\n✓ Options Windows auto focus\n✓ Download Pause Color\n✓ Bar Background Color\n✓ Drag n Drop after Download complete\n✓ History feature. Download Status Bar will remember downloaded files across sessions.\n✓ Open Download Tab only utilizes one tab\n✓ Case insensitivity for file extensions\n✓ Gradient Color for Interface Elements (Download background, progress, complete, pause and speed color can be styled with a linear gradient rather than flat color)\n✓ Arguments for Virus Scanner\n✓ Delete File Warning\n✓ Bar Background Color now has gradient\n✓ Clean completed Downloads when Firefox quits\n✓ Progress Notifications (Progress, Speed and Remaining Time) can be shown/hidden\n✓ 4 color for Download Speed\n✓ Resume context option\n✓ Closing download bar automatically after specific time. This new option is placed above Auto Clear option in Options window.\n✓ MD5 Hash feature in Information Popup.\n✓ Preview for JPEG file.\n✓ "Ask confirmation before deleting downloaded file" option\n✓ Checksum Window to calculate MD5, MD2, SHA1, SHA256, SHA384, SHA512 and compare.\n✓ Statistics Page which is accessible from Add-on context menu\n✓ Vertical/Horizontal Progress Notifications\n✓ Font Size for File Name and Progress Notifications\n✓ Help Page contains full tutorial for Download Status Bar. (Right click Downloads button and select Help option from context menu to open up Help Page)\n✓ Rename Window Interface Update. (It is quicker to rename file now by separated File Name and Extension textboxes.)\n✓ Double Click functionality for Download Item can be set to either Launch or Show File via Options Window. It is placed under "Ask confirmation before deleting downloaded file".\n✓ Keyboard short-cut change via "extensions.downloadbar.shortcutkey" preference if you have a conflicting short-cut. You need to restart Firefox for the new short-cut.\n✓ "Send to" feature to send files to selected folders. Defaults are Desktop and Downloads directory and you can also chose another directory by Custom option.\n\n✓ Locale en-US\n✓ Locale fi-FI Finnish\n✓ Locale de German\n✓ Locale it Italian\n✓ Locale nl Dutch\n✓ Locale pl Polish\n✓ Locale sv-SE Swedish\n✓ Locale zh-CN Chinese (Simplified)\n✓ Locale zh-TW Chinese (Traditional)\n✓ Locale pt-BR Portuguese (Brazilian)\n✓ Locale tr Turkish\n✓ Locale hu Hungarian\n✓ Locale ro Romanian\n✓ Locale ja-JP Japanese\n✓ Locale ru Russian\n✓ Locale fr French\n✓ Locale mk-MK Macedonian\n\nWhen you download files from Internet, Download Status Bar will automatically place progress items in the Download Bar for you. As the name suggest, Download Bar is the bar which is at bottom section of Firefox generally above Add-on Bar. Because Download Status Bar is user friendly and smart enough, Download Bar will only be visible when there is an active download. If there is no download to show, Download Bar hides itself automatically to preserve the web page area for you. And it will show itself again automatically when you start downloading any file from the web.\n\nBut if you want to view Download Bar even if there is no download, you can use below keyboard short-cuts:\n\n<b>Windows: CTRL + ALT + D</b>\n\n<b>Mac OS X: SHIFT + ALT + D</b>\n\n<b>Linux: (CTRL/CMD) + ALT + D</b>\n\nYou can also use above keyboard short-cuts to hide Download Bar any time you wish. In other words those short-cuts work to toggle Download Bar for you. As another option, you can toggle Download Bar by Download Status Bar menu option under Tools menu of Firefox.\n\nAfter you open up Download Bar, you will notice Downloads button on the left and Clear button on the right side of the bar. Downloads button is the main button of Download Status Bar add-on which you can click to open up Add-on Context Menu. Clear button is used to clear all completed downloads from Download Bar by a mouse click.\n\nClicking on Download button will provide Add-on Context Menu as described below:\n<ul><li><b>Options:</b> This menu option will open up add-on Options window where you can customise the add-on according to your needs.</li><li><b>Statistics:</b> This menu option will open up Statistics page which will generate Statistics details and graphs for your previous Download actions.</li><li><b>Show Download History:</b> This menu option will open up default Firefox History Library in case you may want to refer to your Downloads as a list of window.</li><li><b>Open Download Tab:</b> This menu option will open up default Firefox History Library as a browser tab.</li><li><b>Downloads:</b> This menu provides you Pause All Downloads, Resume All Downloads, Cancel All Downloads and Clear All Downloads options to manage your downloads in batch.</li><li><b>Help:</b> This menu option will open up Help page of Download Status Bar where you can get details about the add-on and how to use it in an efficient way.</li><li><b>Close Bar:</b> This menu option will close up Download Bar for you.</li></ul>When you download files from web, Download Status Bar automatically places download items in Download Bar. Below are some example software from Mozilla to download. Click on them to start downloading.\n\n<a rel="nofollow" href="https://outgoing.prod.mozaws.net/v1/6c67e8b626205e8d96b2d0baae45371c6e78c868557026da755005d4e8e7a252/https%3A//download.mozilla.org/%3Fproduct=firefox-26.0&amp;os=osx&amp;lang=en-US">Firefox</a>\n\n<a rel="nofollow" href="https://outgoing.prod.mozaws.net/v1/39095e96302fa4a3ec79a21be70f48cc2e81264f2ac558b4ee3b1eee69401bb9/https%3A//download.mozilla.org/%3Fproduct=thunderbird-24.2.0&amp;os=osx&amp;lang=en-US">Thunderbird</a>\n\n<a rel="nofollow" href="https://outgoing.prod.mozaws.net/v1/0ccc94a0a65abe25cd784b751705b07f456f03363e6919bd64b537f8fd320fda/https%3A//download.mozilla.org/%3Fproduct=seamonkey-2.23&amp;os=osx&amp;lang=en-US">Seamonkey</a>\n\nEach download item contains below elements:\n\nYou can also right click on each download item to get a context menu for more actions and information which are described as below:\n<ul><li><b>Launch:</b> Opens or executes the download file. This option will be available after download has completed.</li><li><b>Show File:</b> Shows the Download file in its containing folder.</li><li><b>Show Manager:</b> Shows the Download History window.</li><li><b>Virus Scan:</b> Scans the download file manually with the Security Software you assigned. This option will ask you to locate and assign a Security Software if you did not assign already.</li><li><b>Checksum:</b> Opens up Checksum window where you can calculate and compare MD5, MD2, SHA1, SHA256, SHA384, SHA512 values for the downloaded file.</li><li><b>Rename:</b> Opens up Rename window to let you rename your downloaded file. This option will be available after download has completed.</li><li><b>Delete File:</b> Deletes downloaded file from your computer. It will ask you confirmation before attempting to delete the file. This option will be available after download has completed.</li><li><b>Go to Download Page:</b> Opens up download page in a new tab.</li><li><b>Copy Download Link:</b> Copies download URL to the Clipboard.</li><li><b>Cancel:</b> Cancels the active download and removes the download file from your computer. This option is available for the downloads that are in progress.</li><li><b>Pause:</b> Pauses the active download.</li><li><b>Resume:</b> Resumes the paused download.</li><li><b>Clear:</b> Clears the download item from Download Bar.</li></ul>You can also left click on each download item to open up Information Popup for the related download which is described below in detail:\n<ul><li><b>Source:</b> Source URL of the download file. Left clicking on Source link will open up Source URL in browser as a new tab. Right clicking on Source link opens Copy menu to copy the Source URL of the download.</li><li><b>Target:</b> Location at which the downloaded file is stored on your computer. Left clicking on Target link will open up the download file in its containing folder. Right clicking on Target link opens Copy menu to copy the file path of the download file.</li><li><b>Current Speed:</b> Current download speed of the active download in KB/s.</li><li><b>Average Speed:</b> Average download speed of the completed download in KB/s. This information will be available after download has completed.</li><li><b>Progress:</b> Progress percent completed for the download.</li><li><b>Remaining Time:</b> Remaining time to complete the download.</li><li><b>Download Time:</b> Time spent to complete the download. This information will be available after download has completed.</li><li><b>Downloaded:</b> First section of this field indicates Current Bytes which is the number of bytes currently transferred while the second section indicates Total Bytes which is the total number of bytes to be transferred before the download finishes.</li><li><b>File Size:</b> Size of the download file on disk. This information will be available after download has completed.</li><li><b>MD5 Hash:</b> Automatically calculated MD5 Hash of the downloaded file. This information will be available after download has completed.</li></ul>Information Popup also contains Preview feature for downloaded images to preview them as thumbnails. Preview feature supports PNG, JPG, GIF and BMP file types. Clicking on Preview thumbnail opens the dowmloaded image in the browser as a new tab.\n\nYou can also hover over a download item to open up Information Tooltip to get download details in a quick pace.\n\n<b>Tip:</b> Double clicking on download item will automatically Launch downloaded file.\n\n<b>Tip:</b> Double clicking on Download Bar automatically clears all completed downloads.\n\n<b>Tip:</b> Middle clicking on download item will clear it from Download Bar.\n\n<b>Tip:</b> Left clicking on empty space in Download Bar will open up Add-on Context Menu.\n\nYou can customise Download Status Bar according to your needs by the Options window. You can open up Options window by right clicking on Downloads button and selecting Options menu. As an alternative, you can click Tools from Firefox menu, then go to Add-ons, find Download Status Bar in the Extensions tab and click on Preferences button to open up Options window. Available options are described as below:\n<ul><li><b>Clear the download item after launching it:</b> Checking this option will let you clear download item automatically from Download bar after you Launch the file either by context menu Launch option or simply double clicking on Download item.</li><li><b>Clear the download item after showing file:</b> Checking this option will let you clear download item automatically from Download bar after showing the download file in its containing folder.</li><li><b>Open Download directory automatically after the download is completed:</b> Checking this option will let you open up Download directory automatically after the download completes.</li><li><b>Automatically open Download Tab when a download starts:</b> Checking this option will let you open up Download Tab automatically in the browser as a tab when a download starts.</li><li><b>Clean completed downloads when Firefox quits:</b> Download Status Bar keeps the History of your downloads from previous session and shows them up in the Download Bar again when the new session starts. If you do not want to keep download History in Download Bar, you can check this option to clear Download items automatically from History when Firefox quits.</li><li><b>Ask confirmation before deleting downloaded file:</b> Before deleting a download item, Download Status Bar ask confirmation to prevent unintended delete actions. If you do not want this confirmation window to speed up the delete process, you can uncheck this option.</li><li><b>Automatically close download bar when all downloads complete:</b> Checking this option will let you keep Download Bar when there are active Downloads but hide it automatically when all Downloads complete to preserve the web page area. You can also specify a time interval before the Download Bar automatically disappears. </li><li><b>Automatically clear these file types:</b> You may find some file types unimportant to keep in Download Bar and want to clear them automatically after a specific time interval. You can type the file extensions to clear in this field separated by commas. Having an * character in this field is meant to be a short-cut for all file types.</li></ul><b>Virus Scan</b>\n\nYou can automatically scan downloaded files by tuning the fields in this options group.\n<ul><li><b>Virus Scanner Path:</b> Location at which your preferred Security Software is stored on your computer. Click Locate to open up File Picker to assign a Security Software for Virus Scan if you did not assign already.</li><li><b>Disable scan for these file types:</b> If you want to omit Automatic Virus Scanning for certain file types, you can type their file extensions in this field by comma separated.</li><li><b>Arguments:</b> Most of the Security Software does not need any additional arguments for Virus Scan so you can leave this section empty as default. If your Security Software needs additional arguments you can type in this field. You can use %1 expression as a placeholder for the file location of downloaded file.</li><li><b>Automatically Scan Downloaded Files:</b> Check this option to automatically scan downloaded files by your Security Software when the download completes.</li></ul><b>Notification</b>\n\nYou can get sound notifications when downloads finish by tuning the fields in this options group.\n<ul><li><b>Audio File Path:</b> Location at which your preferred Notification Sound is stored on your computer. Click Locate to open up File Picker to assign a Sound file for Notification if you did not assign already. Possible sound files that can be assigned as notification are .ogg, .wav and .mp3 file types. Default Sound is the notification sound which is included inside the Download Status Bar add-on.</li><li><b>Preview Sound:</b> If you want to listen to current Notification Sound, you can click play button of sound player to preview the assigned sound file.</li><li><b>Play notification sound when the download is completed:</b> Check this option if you want to get sound notifications when downloads are completed.</li><li><b>Reset Settings:</b> Clicking Reset Settings button will reset the values for Notification options.</li></ul><b>Appearance</b>\n\nYou can customise the interface of Download Status Bar by the options provided in this tab.\n\n<b>Color</b>\n\nYou can change the appearance of Download Items by tuning the color pickers in this options group. Each color is gradient based to create a nice effect for the interface elements. Every color change is applied instantly by Download Status Bar:\n<ul><li><b>Download Background Color:</b> Pick a special color from the related Color Picker to assign color for the background of Download Item.
