Turecki</a>\n<a rel="nofollow" href="https://addons.mozilla.org/zh-CN/firefox/addon/download-status-bar/" title="Chiński uproszczony">zh-CN - Chiński uproszczony</a>\n<a rel="nofollow" href="https://addons.mozilla.org/zh-TW/firefox/addon/download-status-bar/" title="Chiński tradycyjny">zh-TW - Chiński tradycyjny</a>\n\n<i>Ta strona będzie całkowicie przetłumaczona na twój język w ciągu kilku dni. Dziękujemy za wyrozumiałość i cierpliwość.</i>\n\nIf you wish to see Download Status Bar in your own language, please feel free to translate it in <b>Babelzilla</b>.\n\n<a rel="nofollow" href="https://outgoing.prod.mozaws.net/v1/4b280a826a0133a76b2766145fdfc4632e8e08769ec15d98a7f72bbdd5bb4b2d/http%3A//www.babelzilla.org/index.php%3Foption=com_wts&amp;extension=5704&amp;type=show">http://www.babelzilla.org/index.php?option=com_wts&amp;extension=5704&amp;type=show</a>\n\n+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++\n\nYou can get more detailed support from Mozillazine topic:\n<a rel="nofollow" href="https://outgoing.prod.mozaws.net/v1/88aabce9cf880221d6d8b1b9a2fd1cc87fab041d922595e782726a99d4ba5883/http%3A//forums.mozillazine.org/viewtopic.php%3Ff=48&amp;t=2782661">http://forums.mozillazine.org/viewtopic.php?f=48&amp;t=2782661</a>',
     'sv-SE':
      'Download Status Bar hanterar allt som rör dina dina filhämtningar (<strong>Kör</strong>, <strong>Visa</strong>, <strong>Sök igenom</strong>, <strong>Byt namn</strong>, <strong>Kontrollsumma</strong>, <strong>Pausa</strong>, <strong>Återuppta</strong>, <strong>Avbryt</strong>, <strong>Rensa</strong>, <strong>Ta bort</strong>), det sammanställer statistik från dina filhämtningsåtgärder, behåller historiken över föregående sessioners filhämtningar, m.m. Det är inte bara ett filhämtningshanteringstillägg, utan också ett hjälpverktyg som ökar din produktivitet.\n\nDownload Status Bar är utformat efter dina behov och önskningar, dina förväntningar på tillägget utgör kärnan av dess utveckling. Allt för att du skall kunna använda de senaste funktionerna i Firefox 26 för att öka prestandan på din webbläsare och dina filhämtningar. Download Status Bar är ett projekt som drivs och förvaltas av sina egna användare, vilket håller tillägget fräscht och kraftfullt.\n\nHämta en kopia av Download Status Bar och ta kontrollen över dina filhämtningar.\n\n<b>Funktioner</b>\n\n✓ Supports Firefox 26, Firefox 28, Firefox Australis and Firefox 31\n✓ Supports Firefox 25, Firefox 24 ESR and Firefox 24 Before\n✓ Supports Pale Moon\n✓ Automatically close download bar when all downloads completed\n✓ Open download directory when the download is completed\n✓ Clear the download item after launching it\n✓ Clear the download item after showing file\n✓ Download Progress Color\n✓ Download Text Color\n✓ Manual Virus Scan\n✓ Automatic Virus Scan\n✓ Disable virus scan for certain file types\n✓ Double Click on download item will Launch the download file\n✓ Open Download Tab\n✓ Options reachable as Add-on Preferences in Tools / Add-ons / Download Status Bar\n✓ Last Clear will auto close Download Bar\n✓ Key to toggle Download Bar = CTRL + ALT + D for Windows / CMD + ALT + D for Mac\n✓ Go to Download Page\n✓ Copy Download Link\n✓ Download Complete Color\n✓ Play notification sound (supports .ogg, .wav, .mp3 file types)\n✓ Pause/Start/Cancel buttons\n✓ Delete File\n✓ Double click on empty bar space will auto clear completed download items\n✓ Download Speed Color + 4 customizable color\n✓ Download Background Color\n✓ Tools menu option to toggle Download Status Bar\n✓ Flexible Download items\n✓ Download width can be set to a fixed value\n✓ Wildcard support for Auto Clear\n✓ Reset Color Settings\n✓ Right click on empty bar space will show Add-on Menu\n✓ Left Click on download item will show download Information Panel\n✓ Auto Close for Wildcard Clear\n✓ Reset Settings for Notification Sound\n✓ Last Launch will auto close Download Bar\n✓ Last Show File will auto close Download Bar\n✓ Download Panel for Add-on Bar\n✓ Middle click on Download item will clear it\n✓ Clear Button\n✓ Progress percentage, Speed and Remaining time as Progress Notification can be customizable.\n✓ Flash Video Downloader support\n✓ Download Item Width &amp; Height set\n✓ Auto open Download Tab when a Download starts\n✓ Hide Clear Button option\n✓ Mouseover on Download item will open Information Tooltip\n✓ Hide Downloads Button\n✓ Rename File\n✓ Pause All Downloads\n✓ Resume All Downloads\n✓ Cancel All Downloads\n✓ On the fly Option change feature\n✓ Previewing downloaded image files in Information Popup\n✓ Target entry in Information Popup shows File save location\n✓ Clicking Source entry in Information Popup opens it in New Tab\n✓ Clicking Target entry in Information Popup shows the Target file\n✓ Long Source entries are trimmed in Information Popup\n✓ Hovering Source and Target entries shows tooltip\n✓ Downloaded entry in Information Popup shows downloaded bytes\n✓ Preview completed Image files (supports PNG, GIF, JPG, BMP) in Information Popup\n✓ Clicking on preview image opens it in New Tab\n✓ Icons for Context Menus\n✓ Movable Panel can be pinned to Navigation Toolbar\n✓ Drag n Drop Download item will copy file into target folder\n✓ Privacy window support\n✓ Download Counter for Toolbar button\n✓ Porting downloads between Bar and Panel\n✓ Options Windows auto focus\n✓ Download Pause Color\n✓ Bar Background Color\n✓ Drag n Drop after Download complete\n✓ History feature. Download Status Bar will remember downloaded files across sessions.\n✓ Open Download Tab only utilizes one tab\n✓ Case insensitivity for file extensions\n✓ Gradient Color for Interface Elements (Download background, progress, complete, pause and speed color can be styled with a linear gradient rather than flat color)\n✓ Arguments for Virus Scanner\n✓ Delete File Warning\n✓ Bar Background Color now has gradient\n✓ Clean completed Downloads when Firefox quits\n✓ Progress Notifications (Progress, Speed and Remaining Time) can be shown/hidden\n✓ 4 color for Download Speed\n✓ Resume context option\n✓ Closing download bar automatically after specific time. This new option is placed above Auto Clear option in Options window.\n✓ MD5 Hash feature in Information Popup.\n✓ Preview for JPEG file.\n✓ "Ask confirmation before deleting downloaded file" option\n✓ Checksum Window to calculate MD5, MD2, SHA1, SHA256, SHA384, SHA512 and compare.\n✓ Statistics Page which is accessible from Add-on context menu\n✓ Vertical/Horizontal Progress Notifications\n✓ Font Size for File Name and Progress Notifications\n✓ Help Page contains full tutorial for Download Status Bar. (Right click Downloads button and select Help option from context menu to open up Help Page)\n✓ Rename Window Interface Update. (It is quicker to rename file now by separated File Name and Extension textboxes.)\n✓ Double Click functionality for Download Item can be set to either Launch or Show File via Options Window. It is placed under "Ask confirmation before deleting downloaded file".\n✓ Keyboard short-cut change via "extensions.downloadbar.shortcutkey" preference if you have a conflicting short-cut. You need to restart Firefox for the new short-cut.\n✓ "Send to" feature to send files to selected folders. Defaults are Desktop and Downloads directory and you can also chose another directory by Custom option.\n\n✓ Locale en-US\n✓ Locale fi-FI Finnish\n✓ Locale de German\n✓ Locale it Italian\n✓ Locale nl Dutch\n✓ Locale pl Polish\n✓ Locale sv-SE Swedish\n✓ Locale zh-CN Chinese (Simplified)\n✓ Locale zh-TW Chinese (Traditional)\n✓ Locale pt-BR Portuguese (Brazilian)\n✓ Locale tr Turkish\n✓ Locale hu Hungarian\n✓ Locale ro Romanian\n✓ Locale ja-JP Japanese\n✓ Locale ru Russian\n✓ Locale fr French\n✓ Locale mk-MK Macedonian\n\nNär du hämtar filer från webben kommer Download Status Bar automatiskt att lägga till hämtningsobjekten i filhämtningsfältet. Filhämtningsfältet är placerat längst ner i webbläsarfönstret, oftast ovanför tilläggsfältet. För att Download Status Bar skall vara så användarvänligt som möjligt, visas filhämtningsfältet endast när en filhämtning är aktiv. Om det inte finns någon sådan döljs filhämtningsfältet automatiskt för att spara utrymme i webbläsarfönstret. Nästa gång du hämtar en fil kommer det automatiskt att visa sig igen.\n\nOm du vill visa filhämtningsfältet även när ingenting hämtas, så kan du använda kortkommandot för din plattform (nedan):\n\n<b>Windows: Ctrl+Alt+D</b>\n\n<b>Mac OS X: SHIFT + ALT + D</b>\n\n<b>Linux: (Ctrl/Cmd)+Alt+D</b>\n\nDu kan använda samma kortkommando för att närsomhelst dölja filhämtningsfältet, d.v.s. växla visningen med hjälp av det. As another option, you can toggle Download Bar by Download Status Bar menu option under Tools menu of Firefox.\n\nNär du har öppnat filhämtningsfältet ser du två knappar: hämtningsknappen på den vänstra sidan och rensningsknappen på den högra. Hämtningsknappen är Download Status Bars huvudknapp, klicka på den för att öppna tilläggsmenyn. Ett klick på rensningsknappen rensar bort alla slutförda hämtningar från filhämtningsfältet.\n\nEtt klick på hämtningsknappen öppnar tilläggets snabbmeny.:\n<ul><li><b>Inställningar:</b> Det här menyalternativet öppnar inställningsfönstret, där du kan anpassa tillägget efter dina önskemål.</li><li><b>Statistik:</b> Det här menyalternativet öppnar en statistiksida, med statistisk information och diagram över dina hämtningsåtgärder.</li><li><b>Visa hämtningshistorik:</b> Det här menyalternativet öppnar Firefox filhämtningshanterare i ett fönster. Bra för dig som vill se dina hämtningar som en lista i ett fönster.</li><li><b>Öppna Filhämtaren i en flik:</b> Det här menyalternativet öppnar Firefox filhämtningshanterare i en flik i webbläsaren.</li><li><b>Hämtningar:</b> Den här menyn innehåller menyalternativen "Pausa alla hämtningar", "Återuppta alla hämtningar", "Avbryt alla hämtningar" och "Rensa alla hämtningar", som låter dig utföra gruppåtgärder på dina hämtningar.</li><li><b>Hjälp:</b> Det här menyalternativet öppnar Download Status Bars hjälpsida, där du kan få närmare information om tillägget och hur du använder det.</li><li><b>Stäng filhämtningsfältet:</b> Det här menyalternativet stänger filhämtningsfältet.</li></ul>When you download files from web, Download Status Bar automatically places download items in Download Bar. Below are some example software from Mozilla to download. Click on them to start downloading.\n\n<a rel="nofollow" href="https://outgoing.prod.mozaws.net/v1/6c67e8b626205e8d96b2d0baae45371c6e78c868557026da755005d4e8e7a252/https%3A//download.mozilla.org/%3Fproduct=firefox-26.0&amp;os=osx&amp;lang=en-US">Firefox</a>\n\n<a rel="nofollow" href="https://outgoing.prod.mozaws.net/v1/39095e96302fa4a3ec79a21be70f48cc2e81264f2ac558b4ee3b1eee69401bb9/https%3A//download.mozilla.org/%3Fproduct=thunderbird-24.2.0&amp;os=osx&amp;lang=en-US">Thunderbird</a>\n\n<a rel="nofollow" href="https://outgoing.prod.mozaws.net/v1/0ccc94a0a65abe25cd784b751705b07f456f03363e6919bd64b537f8fd320fda/https%3A//download.mozilla.org/%3Fproduct=seamonkey-2.23&amp;os=osx&amp;lang=en-US">Seamonkey</a>\n\nEach download item contains below elements:\n\nYou can also right click on each download item to get a context menu for more actions and information which are described as below:\n<ul><li><b>Kör:</b> Opens or executes the download file. This option will be available after download has completed.</li><li><b>Visa fil:</b> Shows the Download file in its containing folder.</li><li><b>Visa Filhämtaren:</b> Shows the Download History window.</li><li><b>Viruskontroll:</b> Scans the download file manually with the Security Software you assigned. This option will ask you to locate and assign a Security Software if you did not assign already.</li><li><b>Kontrollsumma:</b> Opens up Checksum window where you can calculate and compare MD5, MD2, SHA1, SHA256, SHA384, SHA512 values for the downloaded file.</li><li><b>Byt namn:</b> Opens up Rename window to let you rename your downloaded file. This option will be available after download has completed.</li><li><b>Ta bort fil:</b> Deletes downloaded file from your computer. It will ask you confirmation before attempting to delete the file. This option will be available after download has completed.</li><li><b>Gå till hämtningssidan:</b> Opens up download page in a new tab.</li><li><b>Kopiera hämtningslänk:</b> Copies download URL to the Clipboard.</li><li><b>Avbryt:</b> Cancels the active download and removes the download file from your computer. This option is available for the downloads that are in progress.</li><li><b>Pausa:</b> Pauses the active download.</li><li><b>Återuppta:</b> Resumes the paused download.</li><li><b>Rensa:</b> Clears the download item from Download Bar.</li></ul>You can also left click on each download item to open up Information Popup for the related download which is described below in detail:\n<ul><li><b>Källa:</b> Source URL of the download file. Left clicking on Source link will open up Source URL in browser as a new tab. Right clicking on Source link opens Copy menu to copy the Source URL of the download.</li><li><b>Mål:</b> Location at which the downloaded file is stored on your computer. Left clicking on Target link will open up the download file in its containing folder. Right clicking on Target link opens Copy menu to copy the file path of the download file.</li><li><b>Aktuell hastighet:</b> Current download speed of the active download in KB/s.</li><li><b>Genomsnittlig hastighet:</b> Average download speed of the completed download in KB/s. This information will be available after download has completed.</li><li><b>Förlopp:</b> Progress percent completed for the download.</li><li><b>Återstående tid:</b> Remaining time to complete the download.</li><li><b>Hämtningstid:</b> Time spent to complete the download. This information will be available after download has completed.</li><li><b>Hämtad:</b> First section of this field indicates Current Bytes which is the number of bytes currently transferred while the second section indicates Total Bytes which is the total number of bytes to be transferred before the download finishes.</li><li><b>Filstorlek:</b> Size of the download file on disk. This information will be available after download has completed.</li><li><b>MD5-kondensat:</b> Automatically calculated MD5 Hash of the downloaded file. This information will be available after download has completed.</li></ul>Information Popup also contains Preview feature for downloaded images to preview them as thumbnails. Preview feature supports PNG, JPG, GIF and BMP file types. Clicking on Preview thumbnail opens the dowmloaded image in the browser as a new tab.\n\nYou can also hover over a download item to open up Information Tooltip to get download details in a quick pace.\n\n<b>Tip:</b> Double clicking on download item will automatically Launch downloaded file.\n\n<b>Tip:</b> Double clicking on Download Bar automatically clears all completed downloads.\n\n<b>Tip:</b> Middle clicking on download item will clear it from Download Bar.\n\n<b>Tip:</b> Left clicking on empty space in Download Bar will open up Add-on Context Menu.\n\nYou can customise Download Status Bar according to your needs by the Options window. You can open up Options window by right clicking on Downloads button and selecting Options menu. As an alternative, you can click Tools from Firefox menu, then go to Add-ons, find Download Status Bar in the Extensions tab and click on Preferences button to open up Options window. Available options are described as below:\n<ul><li><b>Rensa hämtningsobjektet när filen körs:</b> Checking this option will let you clear download item automatically from Download bar after you Launch the file either by context menu Launch option or simply double clicking on Download item.</li><li><b>Rensa hämtningsobjektet när filen visas:</b> Checking this option will let you clear download item automatically from Download bar after showing the download file in its containing folder.</li><li><b>Öppna hämtningsmappen automatiskt när hämtningen har slutförts:</b> Checking this option will let you open up Download directory automatically after the download completes.</li><li><b>Öppna automatiskt Filhämtaren i en flik när en hämtning startar:</b> Checking this option will let you open up Download Tab automatically in the browser as a tab when a download starts.</li><li><b>Rensa slutförda hämtningar när Firefox avslutas:</b> Download Status Bar keeps the History of your downloads from previous session and shows them up in the Download Bar again when the new session starts. If you do not want to keep download History in Download Bar, you can check this option to clear Download items automatically from History when Firefox quits.</li><li><b>Begär bekräftelse innan borttagning av hämtad fil:</b> Before deleting a download item, Download Status Bar ask confirmation to prevent unintended delete actions. If you do not want this confirmation window to speed up the delete process, you can uncheck this option.</li><li><b>Stäng filhämtningsfältet automatiskt när alla hämtningar har slutförts:</b> Checking this option will let you keep Download Bar when there are active Downloads but hide it automatically when all Downloads complete to preserve the web page area. You can also specify a time interval before the Download Bar automatically disappears. </li><li><b>Rensa följande filtyper automatiskt:</b> You may find some file types unimportant to keep in Download Bar and want to clear them automatically after a specific time interval. You can type the file extensions to clear in this field separated by commas. Having an * character in this field is meant to be a short-cut for all file types.</li></ul><b>Viruskontroll</b>\n\nYou can automatically scan downloaded files by tuning the fields in this options group.\n<ul><li><b>Sökväg till antivirusprogram:</b> Location at which your preferred Security Software is stored on your computer. Click Locate to open up File Picker to assign a Security Software for Virus Scan if you did not assign already.</li><li><b>Inaktivera genomsökning av följande filtyper:</b> If you want to omit Automatic Virus Scanning for certain file types, you can type their file extensions in this field by comma separated.</li><li><b>Argument:</b> Most of the Security Software does not need any additional arguments for Virus Scan so you can leave this section empty as default. If your Security Software needs additional arguments you can type in this field. You can use %1 expression as a placeholder for the file location of downloaded file.</li><li><b>Sök automatiskt igenom hämtade filer:</b> Check this option to automatically scan downloaded files by your Security Software when the download completes.</li></ul><b>Ljudavisering</b>\n\nYou can get sound notifications when downloads finish by tuning the fields in this options group.\n<ul><li><b>Sökväg till ljudfil:</b> Location at which your preferred Notification Sound is stored on your computer. Click Locate to open up File Picker to assign a Sound file for Notification if you did not assign already. Possible sound files that can be assigned as notification are .ogg, .wav and .mp3 file types. Default Sound is the notification sound which is included inside the Download Status Bar add-on.</li><li><b>Spela upp ljud:</b> If you want to listen to current Notification Sound, you can click play button of sound player to preview the assigned sound file.</li><li><b>Spela upp ett aviseringsljud när hämtningen har slutförts:</b> Check this option if you want to get sound notifications when downloads are completed.</li><li><b>Återställ inställningar:</b> Clicking Reset Settings button will reset the values for Notification options.</li></ul><b>Utseende</b>\n\nYou can customise the interface of Download Status Bar by the options provided in this tab.\n\n<b>Färg</b>\n\nYou can change the appearance of Download Items by tuning the color pickers in this options group. Each color is gradient based to create a nice effect for the interface elements. Every color change is applied instantly by Download Status Bar:\n<ul><li><b>Färg på hämtningens bakgrund:</b> Pick a special color from the related Color Picker to assign color for the background of Download Item. Because Progress color will superpose the background color of Download Item when the download finish, you may want to change this color when you start downloading a large file to be able to see how the color looks like.</li><li><b>Färg på hämtningens förlopp:</b> Pick a special color from the related Color Picker to assign it as progress color for the active Downloads. </li><li><b>Färg på hämtningens text:</b> Pick a special color from the related Color Picker to assign it as text color for File Name and Progress Section of Download Item.</li><li><b>Färg på slutförd hämtning:</b> Pick a special color from the related Color Picker to assign it as a color to indicate completed Downloads.</li><li><b>Färg på pausad hämtning:</b> Pick a special color from the related Color Picker to assign it as a pause color to indicate paused Downloads.</li><li><b>Filhämtningsfältets bakgrundsfärg:</b> Pick a special color from the related Color Picker to assign it as a background color for Download Bar.</li><li><b>Återställ inställningar:</b> Clicking Reset Settings button will reset the values for Color options.</li></ul><b>Hämtningshastighet</b>\n\nYou can assign different colors for different download speeds by tuning the fields in this options group. Assigning Speed Colors will overwrite the Progress Color from the Color options group if you assigned any.\n\n<b>Användargränssnitt</b>\n\nYou can change the interface of Download Status Bar by the fields provided in this options group:\n<ul><li><b>Filhämtningsfält:</b> This is the default download interface for Download Status Bar. If you select this option, Download Items are put in the Download Bar which is placed at the bottom section of the browser.</li><li><b>Filhämtningspanel:</b> If you want to keep your Download privacy from others, you can select this option to place all Download Items in a Toolbar Button Panel. The Toolbar Button will be placed in Add-on Bar as default. If there are no Add-on Bar or if Add-on Bar is hidden at the moment, the Toolbar Button will be placed inside the Navigation Toolbar of Firefox. Toolbar Button has also a counter next to it. First section of counter indicates the number of active downloads in progress and the second part of the counter indicates the number of completed downloads.</li></ul><b>Förloppsaviseringar</b>\n\nYou can hide or show Progress Percent, Speed and Remaining Time items in the Progress Section of Download Items by tuning the checkboxes in this option group.\n\n<b>Justering av förloppsindikator</b>\n\nYou can adjust the Progress Section alignment of Download Items by tuning the fields of this options group. Selecting Horizontal option will place Progress, Speed and Remaining Time elements side by side while switching to Vertical place all Progress elements in vertical position.\n\n<b>Hämtningsobjekt</b>\n\nYou can change the width and height values of a Download item  by tuning the fields in this options group:\n<ul><li><b>Bredd:</b> Place a numerical value in this field to set the width of the Download Item.</li><li><b>Höjd:</b> Place a numerical value in this field to set the height of the Download Item.</li><li><b>Teckenstorlek för filnamn:</b> Place a numerical value in this field to set the font size for the File Name of the Download Item.</li><li><b>Teckenstorlek för förlopp:</b> Place a numerical value in this field to set the font size for the Progress Section of the Download Item.</li></ul><b>Dölj rensningsknappen i filhämtningsfältet:</b> Checking this option will hide Clear button in Download Bar.\n\n<b>Dölj hämtningsknappen i filhämtningsfältet:</b> Checking this option will hide Download button in Download Bar.\n\nDen här sidan finns även översatt till andra språk:\n\n<a rel="nofollow" href="https://addons.mozilla.org/de/firefox/addon/download-status-bar/" title="Tyska">de - Tyska</a>\n<a rel="nofollow" href="https://addons.mozilla.org/en-GB/firefox/addon/download-status-bar/" title="Engelska (brittisk)">en-GB - Engelska (brittisk)</a>\n<a rel="nofollow" href="https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/download-status-bar/" title="Engelska (amerikansk)">en-US - Engelska (amerikansk)</a>\n<a rel="nofollow" href="https://addons.mozilla.org/es-MX/firefox/addon/download-status-bar/" title="Spanish (Mexico)">es-MX - Spanish (Mexico)</a>\n<a rel="nofollow" href="https://addons.mozilla.org/fi-FI/firefox/addon/download-status-bar/" title="Finska">fi-FI - Finska</a>\n<a rel="nofollow" href="https://addons.mozilla.org/fr/firefox/addon/download-status-bar/" title="Franska">fr - Franska</a>\n<a rel="nofollow" href="https://addons.mozilla.org/hu/firefox/addon/download-status-bar/" title="Ungerska">hu - Ungerska</a>\n<a rel="nofollow" href="https://addons.mozilla.org/it/firefox/addon/download-status-bar/" title="Italienska">it - Italienska</a>\n<a rel="nofollow" href="https://addons.mozilla.org/ja-JP/firefox/addon/download-status-bar/" title="Japanska">ja-JP - Japanska</a>\n<a rel="nofollow" href="https://addons.mozilla.org/mk-MK/firefox/addon/download-status-bar/" title="Makedonska">mk-MK - Makedonska</a>\n<a rel="nofollow" href="https://addons.mozilla.org/nl/firefox/addon/download-status-bar/" title="Nederländska">nl - Nederländska</a>\n<a rel="nofollow" href="https://addons.mozilla.org/pl/firefox/addon/download-status-bar/" title="Polska">pl - Polska</a>\n<a rel="nofollow" href="https://addons.mozilla.org/pt-BR/firefox/addon/download-status-bar/" title="Portugisiska (brasiliansk)">pt-BR - Portugisiska (brasiliansk)</a>\n<a rel="nofollow" href="https://addons.mozilla.org/ro/firefox/addon/download-status-bar/" title="Rumänska">ro - Rumänska</a>\n<a rel="nofollow" href="https://addons.mozilla.org/ru/firefox/addon/download-status-bar/" title="Ryska">ru - Ryska</a>\n<a rel="nofollow" href="https://addons.mozilla.org/sv-SE/firefox/addon/download-status-bar/" title="Svenska">sv-SE - Svenska</a>\n<a rel="nofollow" href="https://addons.mozilla.org/tr/firefox/addon/download-status-bar/" title="Turkiska">tr - Turkiska</a>\n<a rel="nofollow" href="https://addons.mozilla.org/zh-CN/firefox/addon/download-status-bar/" title="Kinesiska (förenklad)">zh-CN - Kinesiska (förenklad)</a>\n<a rel="nofollow" href="https://addons.mozilla.org/zh-TW/firefox/addon/download-status-bar/" title="Kinesiska (traditionell)">zh-TW - Kinesiska (traditionell)</a>\n\n<i>Den här sidan kommer att översättas till ditt eget språk inom några dagar. Tack för ditt tålamod.</i>\n\nIf you wish to see Download Status Bar in your own language, please feel free to translate it in <b>Babelzilla</b>.\n\n<a rel="nofollow" href="https://outgoing.prod.mozaws.net/v1/4b280a826a0133a76b2766145fdfc4632e8e08769ec15d98a7f72bbdd5bb4b2d/http%3A//www.babelzilla.org/index.php%3Foption=com_wts&amp;extension=5704&amp;type=show">http://www.babelzilla.org/index.php?option=com_wts&amp;extension=5704&amp;type=show</a>\n\n+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++\n\nYou can get more detailed support from Mozillazine topic:\n<a rel="nofollow" href="https://outgoing.prod.mozaws.net/v1/88aabce9cf880221d6d8b1b9a2fd1cc87fab041d922595e782726a99d4ba5883/http%3A//forums.mozillazine.org/viewtopic.php%3Ff=48&amp;t=2782661">http://forums.mozillazine.org/viewtopic.php?f=48&amp;t=2782661</a>',
     fi:
      'Download Status Bar hallitsee latauksiasi täydellisesti. (<strong>Käynnistä</strong>, <strong>Näytä</strong>, <strong>Skannaa</strong>, <strong>Nimeä uudelleen</strong>, <strong>Tarkistussumma</strong>, <strong>Tauko</strong>, <strong>Jatka</strong>, <strong>Peruuta</strong>, <strong>Tyhjennä</strong>, <strong>Poista</strong>), Luo tilastoja latauksistasi, pitää lataushistorian istuntojen välillä ja paljon muuta. Se ei ole vain latauksenhallintatyökalu vaan myös apuohjelma joka lisää tuottavuuttasi.\n\nDownload Status Bar on suunniteltu sinun tarpeidesi ja pyyntöjesi mukaan käyttäen Firefox 26:n uusimpia ominaisuuksia. Download Status Barin kehityksestä huolehtivat käyttäjät, jotka pitävät lisäosan tuoreena.\n\nLataa Download Status Bar saadaksesi täydellisen kontrollin latauksillesi.\n\n<b>Ominaisuudet</b>\n\n✓ Supports Firefox 26, Firefox 28, Firefox Australis and Firefox 31\n✓ Supports Firefox 25, Firefox 24 ESR and Firefox 24 Before\n✓ Supports Pale Moon\n✓ Automatically close download bar when all downloads completed\n✓ Open download directory when the download is completed\n✓ Clear the download item after launching it\n✓ Clear the download item after showing file\n✓ Download Progress Color\n✓ Download Text Color\n✓ Manual Virus Scan\n✓ Automatic Virus Scan\n✓ Disable virus scan for certain file types\n✓ Double Click on download item will Launch the download file\n✓ Open Download Tab\n✓ Options reachable as Add-on Preferences in Tools / Add-ons / Download Status Bar\n✓ Last Clear will auto close Download Bar\n✓ Key to toggle Download Bar = CTRL + ALT + D for Windows / CMD + ALT + D for Mac\n✓ Go to Download Page\n✓ Copy Download Link\n✓ Download Complete Color\n✓ Play notification sound (supports .ogg, .wav, .mp3 file types)\n✓ Pause/Start/Cancel buttons\n✓ Delete File\n✓ Double click on empty bar space will auto clear completed download items\n✓ Download Speed Color + 4 customizable color\n✓ Download Background Color\n✓ Tools menu option to toggle Download Status Bar\n✓ Flexible Download items\n✓ Download width can be set to a fixed value\n✓ Wildcard support for Auto Clear\n✓ Reset Color Settings\n✓ Right click on empty bar space will show Add-on Menu\n✓ Left Click on download item will show download Information Panel\n✓ Auto Close for Wildcard Clear\n✓ Reset Settings for Notification Sound\n✓ Last Launch will auto close Download Bar\n✓ Last Show File will auto close Download Bar\n✓ Download Panel for Add-on Bar\n✓ Middle click on Download item will clear it\n✓ Clear Button\n✓ Progress percentage, Speed and Remaining time as Progress Notification can be customizable.\n✓ Flash Video Downloader support\n✓ Download Item Width &amp; Height set\n✓ Auto open Download Tab when a Download starts\n✓ Hide Clear Button option\n✓ Mouseover on Download item will open Information Tooltip\n✓ Hide Downloads Button\n✓ Rename File\n✓ Pause All Downloads\n✓ Resume All Downloads\n✓ Cancel All Downloads\n✓ On the fly Option change feature\n✓ Previewing downloaded image files in Information Popup\n✓ Target entry in Information Popup shows File save location\n✓ Clicking Source entry in Information Popup opens it in New Tab\n✓ Clicking Target entry in Information Popup shows the Target file\n✓ Long Source entries are trimmed in Information Popup\n✓ Hovering Source and Target entries shows tooltip\n✓ Downloaded entry in Information Popup shows downloaded bytes\n✓ Preview completed Image files (supports PNG, GIF, JPG, BMP) in Information Popup\n✓ Clicking on preview image opens it in New Tab\n✓ Icons for Context Menus\n✓ Movable Panel can be pinned to Navigation Toolbar\n✓ Drag n Drop Download item will copy file into target folder\n✓ Privacy window support\n✓ Download Counter for Toolbar button\n✓ Porting downloads between Bar and Panel\n✓ Options Windows auto focus\n✓ Download Pause Color\n✓ Bar Background Color\n✓ Drag n Drop after Download complete\n✓ History feature. Download Status Bar will remember downloaded files across sessions.\n✓ Open Download Tab only utilizes one tab\n✓ Case insensitivity for file extensions\n✓ Gradient Color for Interface Elements (Download background, progress, complete, pause and speed color can be styled with a linear gradient rather than flat color)\n✓ Arguments for Virus Scanner\n✓ Delete File Warning\n✓ Bar Background Color now has gradient\n✓ Clean completed Downloads when Firefox quits\n✓ Progress Notifications (Progress, Speed and Remaining Time) can be shown/hidden\n✓ 4 color for Download Speed\n✓ Resume context option\n✓ Closing download bar automatically after specific time. This new option is placed above Auto Clear option in Options window.\n✓ MD5 Hash feature in Information Popup.\n✓ Preview for JPEG file.\n✓ "Ask confirmation before deleting downloaded file" option\n✓ Checksum Window to calculate MD5, MD2, SHA1, SHA256, SHA384, SHA512 and compare.\n✓ Statistics Page which is accessible from Add-on context menu\n✓ Vertical/Horizontal Progress Notifications\n✓ Font Size for File Name and Progress Notifications\n✓ Help Page contains full tutorial for Download Status Bar. (Right click Downloads button and select Help option from context menu to open up Help Page)\n✓ Rename Window Interface Update. (It is quicker to rename file now by separated File Name and Extension textboxes.)\n✓ Double Click functionality for Download Item can be set to either Launch or Show File via Options Window. It is placed under "Ask confirmation before deleting downloaded file".\n✓ Keyboard short-cut change via "extensions.downloadbar.shortcutkey" preference if you have a conflicting short-cut. You need to restart Firefox for the new short-cut.\n✓ "Send to" feature to send files to selected folders. Defaults are Desktop and Downloads directory and you can also chose another directory by Custom option.\n\n✓ Locale en-US\n✓ Locale fi-FI Finnish\n✓ Locale de German\n✓ Locale it Italian\n✓ Locale nl Dutch\n✓ Locale pl Polish\n✓ Locale sv-SE Swedish\n✓ Locale zh-CN Chinese (Simplified)\n✓ Locale zh-TW Chinese (Traditional)\n✓ Locale pt-BR Portuguese (Brazilian)\n✓ Locale tr Turkish\n✓ Locale hu Hungarian\n✓ Locale ro Romanian\n✓ Locale ja-JP Japanese\n✓ Locale ru Russian\n✓ Locale fr French\n✓ Locale mk-MK Macedonian\n\nKun lataat tiedostoja internetistä, Download Status Bar lisää automaattisesti tiedostot latauspalkkiin. Kuten nimikin jo kertoo, latauspalkki on palkki jonka Firefox luo yleensä lisäosapalkin yläpuolelle. Koska Download Status Bar on käyttäjäystävällinen ja viisas, latauspalkki on näkyvillä vain kun sinulla on aktiivisia latauksia. Jos näytettäviä latauksia ei ole, latauspalkki piilottaa itsensä automaattisesti.\n\nJos haluat näyttää latauspalkin, voit painaa seuraavia näppäimiä:\n\n<b>Windows: CTRL + ALT + D</b>\n\n<b>Mac OS X: SHIFT + ALT + D</b>\n\n<b>Linux (CTRL/CMD) + ALT + D</b>\n\nVoit myös käyttää ylläolevia näppäimiä piilottaaksesi latauspalkin milloin haluat. As another option, you can toggle Download Bar by Download Status Bar menu option under Tools menu of Firefox.\n\nKun avaat latauspalkin, näet Lataukset-napin vasemmalla ja Tyhjennä-napin palkin oikealla puolella. Lataukset-napista saat esiin valikon. Tyhjennä-nappi tyhjentää kaikki valmiit lataukset latauspalkista.\n\nKun painat Lataukset-nappia, saat esiin valikon kuten kerrottu alla.:\n<ul><li><b>Asetukset:</b> Tämä valinta avaa asetukset josta voit mukauttaa lisäosaa tarpeidesi mukaan.</li><li><b>Tilastot:</b> Tämä valinta avaa tilastot josta näet tilastoja perustuen latauksiisi.</li><li><b>Näytä lataushistoria:</b> Tämä valinta näyttää Firefoxin täydellisen lataushistorian.</li><li><b>Avaa Lataukset-välilehti:</b> Tämä valinta avaa Firefoxin lataushistorian välilehteen.</li><li><b>Lataukset:</b> Tämä valinta antaa sinun hallita kaikkien latauksiesi tilaa kerralla.</li><li><b>Apua:</b> Tämä valinta avaa Download Status Barin apusivun josta saat tietoa lisäosasta ja siitä, kuinka käyttää sitä hyödyllisellä tavalla.</li><li><b>Sulje palkki:</b> Tämä valinta sulkee latauspalkin.</li></ul>When you download files from web, Download Status Bar automatically places download items in Download Bar. Below are some example software from Mozilla to download. Click on them to start downloading.\n\n<a rel="nofollow" href="https://outgoing.prod.mozaws.net/v1/6c67e8b626205e8d96b2d0baae45371c6e78c868557026da755005d4e8e7a252/https%3A//download.mozilla.org/%3Fproduct=firefox-26.0&amp;os=osx&amp;lang=en-US">Firefox</a>\n\n<a rel="nofollow" href="https://outgoing.prod.mozaws.net/v1/39095e96302fa4a3ec79a21be70f48cc2e81264f2ac558b4ee3b1eee69401bb9/https%3A//download.mozilla.org/%3Fproduct=thunderbird-24.2.0&amp;os=osx&amp;lang=en-US">Thunderbird</a>\n\n<a rel="nofollow" href="https://outgoing.prod.mozaws.net/v1/0ccc94a0a65abe25cd784b751705b07f456f03363e6919bd64b537f8fd320fda/https%3A//download.mozilla.org/%3Fproduct=seamonkey-2.23&amp;os=osx&amp;lang=en-US">Seamonkey</a>\n\nEach download item contains below elements:\n\nYou can also right click on each download item to get a context menu for more actions and information which are described as below:\n<ul><li><b>Avaa:</b> Opens or executes the download file. This option will be available after download has completed.</li><li><b>Näytä tiedosto:</b> Shows the Download file in its containing folder.</li><li><b>Näytä lataukset:</b> Shows the Download History window.</li><li><b>Virusskannaus:</b> Scans the download file manually with the Security Software you assigned. This option will ask you to locate and assign a Security Software if you did not assign already.</li><li><b>Tarkistussumma:</b> Opens up Checksum window where you can calculate and compare MD5, MD2, SHA1, SHA256, SHA384, SHA512 values for the downloaded file.</li><li><b>Nimeä uudelleen:</b> Opens up Rename window to let you rename your downloaded file. This option will be available after download has completed.</li><li><b>Poista tiedosto:</b> Deletes downloaded file from your computer. It will ask you confirmation before attempting to delete the file. This option will be available after download has completed.</li><li><b>Mene lataussivulle:</b> Opens up download page in a new tab.</li><li><b>Kopioi latauslinkki:</b> Copies download URL to the Clipboard.</li><li><b>Peruuta:</b> Cancels the active download and removes the download file from your computer. This option is available for the downloads that are in progress.</li><li><b>Tauko:</b> Pauses the active download.</li><li><b>Jatka:</b> Resumes the paused download.</li><li><b>Tyhjennä:</b> Clears the download item from Download Bar.</li></ul>You can also left click on each download item to open up Information Popup for the related download which is described below in detail:\n<ul><li><b>Lähde:</b> Source URL of the download file. Left clicking on Source link will open up Source URL in browser as a new tab. Right clicking on Source link opens Copy menu to copy the Source URL of the download.</li><li><b>Kohde:</b> Location at which the downloaded file is stored on your computer. Left clicking on Target link will open up the download file in its containing folder. Right clicking on Target link opens Copy menu to copy the file path of the download file.</li><li><b>Nykyinen nopeus:</b> Current download speed of the active download in KB/s.</li><li><b>Keskinopeus:</b> Average download speed of the completed download in KB/s. This information will be available after download has completed.</li><li><b>Edistyminen:</b> Progress percent completed for the download.</li><li><b>Jäljellä oleva aika:</b> Remaining time to complete the download.</li><li><b>Latausaika:</b> Time spent to complete the download. This information will be available after download has completed.</li><li><b>Ladattu:</b> First section of this field indicates Current Bytes which is the number of bytes currently transferred while the second section indicates Total Bytes which is the total number of bytes to be transferred before the download finishes.</li><li><b>Tiedostokoko:</b> Size of the download file on disk. This information will be available after download has completed.</li><li><b>MD5-tarkistussumma:</b> Automatically calculated MD5 Hash of the downloaded file. This information will be available after download has completed.</li></ul>Information Popup also contains Preview feature for downloaded images to preview them as thumbnails. Preview feature supports PNG, JPG, GIF and BMP file types. Clicking on Preview thumbnail opens the dowmloaded image in the browser as a new tab.\n\nYou can also hover over a download item to open up Information Tooltip to get download details in a quick pace.\n\n<b>Tip:</b> Double clicking on download item will automatically Launch downloaded file.\n\n<b>Tip:</b> Double clicking on Download Bar automatically clears all completed downloads.\n\n<b>Tip:</b> Middle clicking on download item will clear it from Download Bar.\n\n<b>Tip:</b> Left clicking on empty space in Download Bar will open up Add-on Context Menu.\n\nYou can customise Download Status Bar according to your needs by the Options window. You can open up Options window by right clicking on Downloads button and selecting Options menu. As an alternative, you can click Tools from Firefox menu, then go to Add-ons, find Download Status Bar in the Extensions tab and click on Preferences button to open up Options window. Available options are described as below:\n<ul><li><b>Tyhjennä lataus avaamisen jälkeen:</b> Checking this option will let you clear download item automatically from Download bar after you Launch the file either by context menu Launch option or simply double clicking on Download item.</li><li><b>Tyhjennä lataus tiedoston näyttämisen jälkeen:</b> Checking this option will let you clear download item automatically from Download bar after showing the download file in its containing folder.</li><li><b>Avaa latauskansio automaattisesti kun lataus on valmis:</b> Checking this option will let you open up Download directory automatically after the download completes.</li><li><b>Avaa Lataukset-välilehti automaattisesti kun lataus alkaa:</b> Checking this option will let you open up Download Tab automatically in the browser as a tab when a download starts.</li><li><b>Tyhjennä valmiit lataukset kun Firefox suljetaan:</b> Download Status Bar keeps the History of your downloads from previous session and shows them up in the Download Bar again when the new session starts. If you do not want to keep download History in Download Bar, you can check this option to clear Download items automatically from History when Firefox quits.</li><li><b>Kysy varmistus ennen tiedoston poistoa:</b> Before deleting a download item, Download Status Bar ask confirmation to prevent unintended delete actions. If you do not want this confirmation window to speed up the delete process, you can uncheck this option.</li><li><b>Sulje palkki automaattisesti kun kaikki lataukset ovat valmiit:</b> Checking this option will let you keep Download Bar when there are active Downloads but hide it automatically when all Downloads complete to preserve the web page area. You can also specify a time interval before the Download Bar automatically disappears. </li><li><b>Tyhjennä seuraavat tiedostotyypit automaattisesti:</b> You may find some file types unimportant to keep in Download Bar and want to clear them automatically after a specific time interval. You can type the file extensions to clear in this field separated by commas. Having an * character in this field is meant to be a short-cut for all file types.</li></ul><b>Virusskanneri</b>\n\nYou can automatically scan downloaded files by tuning the fields in this options group.\n<ul><li><b>Virusskannerin polku:</b> Location at which your preferred Security Software is stored on your computer. Click Locate to open up File Picker to assign a Security Software for Virus Scan if you did not assign already.</li><li><b>Älä skannaa näitä tiedostotyyppejä:</b> If you want to omit Automatic Virus Scanning for certain file types, you can type their file extensions in this field by comma separated.</li><li><b>Parametrit:</b> Most of the Security Software does not need any additional arguments for Virus Scan so you can leave this section empty as default. If your Security Software needs additional arguments you can type in this field. You can use %1 expression as a placeholder for the file location of downloaded file.</li><li><b>Skannaa ladatut tiedostot automaattisesti:</b> Check this option to automatically scan downloaded files by your Security Software when the download completes.</li></ul><b>Huomautus</b>\n\nYou can get sound notifications when downloads finish by tuning the fields in this options group.\n<ul><li><b>Äänitiedoston polku:</b> Location at which your preferred Notification Sound is stored on your computer. Click Locate to open up File Picker to assign a Sound file for Notification if you did not assign already. Possible sound files that can be assigned as notification are .ogg, .wav and .mp3 file types. Default Sound is the notification sound which is included inside the Download Status Bar add-on.</li><li><b>Esikuuntele ääni:</b> If you want to listen to current Notification Sound, you can click play button of sound player to preview the assigned sound file.</li><li><b>Soita huomautusääni kun lataus on valmis:</b> Check this option if you want to get sound notifications when downloads are completed.</li><li><b>Nollaa asetukset:</b> Clicking Reset Settings button will reset the values for Notification options.</li></ul><b>Ulkoasu</b>\n\nYou can customise the interface of Download Status Bar by the options provided in this tab.\n\n<b>Väri</b>\n\nYou can change the appearance of Download Items by tuning the color pickers in this options group. Each color is gradient based to create a nice effect for the interface elements. Every color change is applied instantly by Download Status Bar:\n<ul><li><b>Latauksen taustaväri:</b> Pick a special color from the related Color Picker to assign color for the background of Download Item. Because Progress color will superpose the background color of Download Item when the download finish, you may want to change this color when you start downloading a large file to be able to see how the color looks like.</li><li><b>Latauksen etenemisen väri:</b> Pick a special color from the related Color Picker to assign it as progress color for the active Downloads. </li><li><b>Latauksen tekstin väri:</b> Pick a special color from the related Color Picker to assign it as text color for File Name and Progress Section of Download Item.</li><li><b>Valmiin latauksen väri:</b> Pick a special color from the related Color Picker to assign it as a color to indicate completed Downloads.</li><li><b>Tauotetun latauksen väri:</b> Pick a special color from the related Color Picker to assign it as a pause color to indicate paused Downloads.</li><li><b>Palkin taustaväri:</b> Pick a special color from the related Color Picker to assign it as a background color for Download Bar.</li><li><b>Nollaa asetukset:</b> Clicking Reset Settings button will reset the values for Color options.</li></ul><b>Latausnopeus</b>\n\nYou can assign different colors for different download speeds by tuning the fields in this options group. Assigning Speed Colors will overwrite the Progress Color from the Color options group if you assigned any.\n\n<b>Käyttöliittymä</b>\n\nYou can change the interface of Download Status Bar by the fields provided in this options group:\n<ul><li><b>Latauspalkki:</b> This is the default download interface for Download Status Bar. If you select this option, Download Items are put in the Download Bar which is placed at the bottom section of the browser.</li><li><b>Latauspaneeli:</b> If you want to keep your Download privacy from others, you can select this option to place all Download Items in a Toolbar Button Panel. The Toolbar Button will be placed in Add-on Bar as default. If there are no Add-on Bar or if Add-on Bar is hidden at the moment, the Toolbar Button will be placed inside the Navigation Toolbar of Firefox. Toolbar Button has also a counter next to it. First section of counter indicates the number of active downloads in progress and the second part of the counter indicates the number of completed downloads.</li></ul><b>Etenemisen ilmoitukset</b>\n\nYou can hide or show Progress Percent, Speed and Remaining Time items in the Progress Section of Download Items by tuning the checkboxes in this option group.\n\n<b>Etenemisen kohdistaminen</b>\n\nYou can adjust the Progress Section alignment of Download Items by tuning the fields of this options group. Selecting Horizontal option will place Progress, Speed and Remaining Time elements side by side while switching to Vertical place all Progress elements in vertical position.\n\n<b>Ladattava tiedosto</b>\n\nYou can change the width and height values of a Download item  by tuning the fields in this options group:\n<ul><li><b>Leveys:</b> Place a numerical value in this field to set the width of the Download Item.</li><li><b>Korkeus:</b> Place a numerical value in this field to set the height of the Download Item.</li><li><b>Tiedostonimen fonttikoko:</b> Place a numerical value in this field to set the font size for the File Name of the Download Item.</li><li><b>Etenemisen fonttikoko:</b> Place a numerical value in this field to set the font size for the Progress Section of the Download Item.</li></ul><b>Piilota Tyhjennä-nappi latauspalkissa:</b> Checking this option will hide Clear button in Download Bar.\n\n<b>Piilota Lataukset-nappi latauspalkissa:</b> Checking this option will hide Download button in Download Bar.\n\nTämä sivu on saatavana myös seuraavilla kielillä:\n\n<a rel="nofollow" href="https://addons.mozilla.org/de/firefox/addon/download-status-bar/" title="Saksa">de - Saksa</a>\n<a rel="nofollow" href="https://addons.mozilla.org/en-GB/firefox/addon/download-status-bar/" title="Englanti (Iso-Britannia)">en-GB - Englanti (Iso-Britannia)</a>\n<a rel="nofollow" href="https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/download-status-bar/" title="Englanti (USA)">en-US - Englanti (USA)</a>\n<a rel="nofollow" href="https://addons.mozilla.org/fi-FI/firefox/addon/download-status-bar/" title="Suomi">fi-FI - Suomi</a>\n<a rel="nofollow" href="https://addons.mozilla.org/fr/firefox/addon/download-status-bar/" title="Ranska">fr - Ranska</a>\n<a rel="nofollow" href="https://addons.mozilla.org/hu/firefox/addon/download-status-bar/" title="Unkari">hu - Unkari</a>\n<a rel="nofollow" href="https://addons.mozilla.org/it/firefox/addon/download-status-bar/" title="Italia">it - Italia</a>\n<a rel="nofollow" href="https://addons.mozilla.org/ja-JP/firefox/addon/download-status-bar/" title="Japani">ja-JP - Japani</a>\n<a rel="nofollow" href="https://addons.mozilla.org/mk-MK/firefox/addon/download-status-bar/" title="Makedonia">mk-MK - Makedonia</a>\n<a rel="nofollow" href="https://addons.mozilla.org/nl/firefox/addon/download-status-bar/" title="Hollanti">nl - Hollanti</a>\n<a rel="nofollow" href="https://addons.mozilla.org/pl/firefox/addon/download-status-bar/" title="Puola">pl - Puola</a>\n<a rel="nofollow" href="https://addons.mozilla.org/pt-BR/firefox/addon/download-status-bar/" title="Portugali (Brasilia)">pt-BR - Portugali (Brasilia)</a>\n<a rel="nofollow" href="https://addons.mozilla.org/ro/firefox/addon/download-status-bar/" title="Romania">ro - Romania</a>\n<a rel="nofollow" href="https://addons.mozilla.org/ru/firefox/addon/download-status-bar/" title="Venäjä">ru - Venäjä</a>\n<a rel="nofollow" href="https://addons.mozilla.org/sv-SE/firefox/addon/download-status-bar/" title="Ruotsi">sv-SE - Ruotsi</a>\n<a rel="nofollow" href="https://addons.mozilla.org/tr/firefox/addon/download-status-bar/" title="Turkki">tr - Turkki</a>\n<a rel="nofollow" href="https://addons.mozilla.org/zh-CN/firefox/addon/download-status-bar/" title="Kiina (yksinkertaistettu)">zh-CN - Kiina (yksinkertaistettu)</a>\n<a rel="nofollow" href="https://addons.mozilla.org/zh-TW/firefox/addon/download-status-bar/" title="Kiina (Traditionaali)">zh-TW - Kiina (Traditionaali)</a>\n\n<i>Tämä sivu käännetään kokonaan kielellesi muutaman päivän kuluessa. Kiitos ymmärryksestä.</i>\n\nIf you wish to see Download Status Bar in your own language, please feel free to translate it in <b>Babelzilla</b>.\n\n<a rel="nofollow" href="https://outgoing.prod.mozaws.net/v1/4b280a826a0133a76b2766145fdfc4632e8e08769ec15d98a7f72bbdd5bb4b2d/http%3A//www.babelzilla.org/index.php%3Foption=com_wts&amp;extension=5704&amp;type=show">http://www.babelzilla.org/index.php?option=com_wts&amp;extension=5704&amp;type=show</a>\n\n+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++\n\nYou can get more detailed support from Mozillazine topic:\n<a rel="nofollow" href="https://outgoing.prod.mozaws.net/v1/88aabce9cf880221d6d8b1b9a2fd1cc87fab041d922595e782726a99d4ba5883/http%3A//forums.mozillazine.org/viewtopic.php%3Ff=48&amp;t=2782661">http://forums.mozillazine.org/viewtopic.php?f=48&amp;t=2782661</a>',
     ro:
      'Download Status Bar gestionează în mod exhaustiv descărcările pe care le faceți (<strong>deschidere, lansare în execuție</strong>, <strong>afișare dosar de stocare</strong>, <strong>scanare împotriva virușilor</strong>, <strong>redenumire</strong>, <strong>verificare sumă de control</strong>, <strong>suspendare</strong>, <strong>reluare</strong>, <strong>anulare</strong>, <strong>curățare elemente aferente fișierelor descărcate</strong>, <strong>ștergere</strong>), elaborează statistici, menține istoricul descărcărilor anterioare și face încă multe altele.  Download Status Bar nu este doar o extensie de gestiune a descărcărilor ci este un instrument de îmbunătățire a productivității dumneavoastră.\n\nDownload Status Bar este special proiectată pentru a ține cont de nevoile și solicitările utilizatorilor. Toate așteptările dumneavoastră sunt reflectate în nucleul extensiei astfel încât, utilizând noile caracteristici ale Firefox, aceasta să îmbunătățească performanțele navigării și descărcărilor dumneavoastră.  Download Status Bar este un proiect gestionat de către proprii utilizatori, care se păstrează proaspăt și puternic.\n\nInstalați Download Status Bar pentru obține controlul total asupra descărcărilor dumneavoastră.\n\n<b>Caracteristici</b>\n\n✓ Supports Firefox 26, Firefox 28, Firefox Australis and Firefox 31\n✓ Supports Firefox 25, Firefox 24 ESR and Firefox 24 Before\n✓ Supports Pale Moon\n✓ Automatically close download bar when all downloads completed\n✓ Open download directory when the download is completed\n✓ Clear the download item after launching it\n✓ Clear the download item after showing file\n✓ Download Progress Color\n✓ Download Text Color\n✓ Manual Virus Scan\n✓ Automatic Virus Scan\n✓ Disable virus scan for certain file types\n✓ Double Click on download item will Launch the download file\n✓ Open Download Tab\n✓ Options reachable as Add-on Preferences in Tools / Add-ons / Download Status Bar\n✓ Last Clear will auto close Download Bar\n✓ Key to toggle Download Bar = CTRL + ALT + D for Windows / CMD + ALT + D for Mac\n✓ Go to Download Page\n✓ Copy Download Link\n✓ Download Complete Color\n✓ Play notification sound (supports .ogg, .wav, .mp3 file types)\n✓ Pause/Start/Cancel buttons\n✓ Delete File\n✓ Double click on empty bar space will auto clear completed download items\n✓ Download Speed Color + 4 customizable color\n✓ Download Background Color\n✓ Tools menu option to toggle Download Status Bar\n✓ Flexible Download items\n✓ Download width can be set to a fixed value\n✓ Wildcard support for Auto Clear\n✓ Reset Color Settings\n✓ Right click on empty bar space will show Add-on Menu\n✓ Left Click on download item will show download Information Panel\n✓ Auto Close for Wildcard Clear\n✓ Reset Settings for Notification Sound\n✓ Last Launch will auto close Download Bar\n✓ Last Show File will auto close Download Bar\n✓ Download Panel for Add-on Bar\n✓ Middle click on Download item will clear it\n✓ Clear Button\n✓ Progress percentage, Speed and Remaining time as Progress Notification can be customizable.\n✓ Flash Video Downloader support\n✓ Download Item Width &amp; Height set\n✓ Auto open Download Tab when a Download starts\n✓ Hide Clear Button option\n✓ Mouseover on Download item will open Information Tooltip\n✓ Hide Downloads Button\n✓ Rename File\n✓ Pause All Downloads\n✓ Resume All Downloads\n✓ Cancel All Downloads\n✓ On the fly Option change feature\n✓ Previewing downloaded image files in Information Popup\n✓ Target entry in Information Popup shows File save location\n✓ Clicking Source entry in Information Popup opens it in New Tab\n✓ Clicking Target entry in Information Popup shows the Target file\n✓ Long Source entries are trimmed in Information Popup\n✓ Hovering Source and Target entries shows tooltip\n✓ Downloaded entry in Information Popup shows downloaded bytes\n✓ Preview completed Image files (supports PNG, GIF, JPG, BMP) in Information Popup\n✓ Clicking on preview image opens it in New Tab\n✓ Icons for Context Menus\n✓ Movable Panel can be pinned to Navigation Toolbar\n✓ Drag n Drop Download item will copy file into target folder\n✓ Privacy window support\n✓ Download Counter for Toolbar button\n✓ Porting downloads between Bar and Panel\n✓ Options Windows auto focus\n✓ Download Pause Color\n✓ Bar Background Color\n✓ Drag n Drop after Download complete\n✓ History feature. Download Status Bar will remember downloaded files across sessions.\n✓ Open Download Tab only utilizes one tab\n✓ Case insensitivity for file extensions\n✓ Gradient Color for Interface Elements (Download background, progress, complete, pause and speed color can be styled with a linear gradient rather than flat color)\n✓ Arguments for Virus Scanner\n✓ Delete File Warning\n✓ Bar Background Color now has gradient\n✓ Clean completed Downloads when Firefox quits\n✓ Progress Notifications (Progress, Speed and Remaining Time) can be shown/hidden\n✓ 4 color for Download Speed\n✓ Resume context option\n✓ Closing download bar automatically after specific time. This new option is placed above Auto Clear option in Options window.\n✓ MD5 Hash feature in Information Popup.\n✓ Preview for JPEG file.\n✓ "Ask confirmation before deleting downloaded file" option\n✓ Checksum Window to calculate MD5, MD2, SHA1, SHA256, SHA384, SHA512 and compare.\n✓ Statistics Page which is accessible from Add-on context menu\n✓ Vertical/Horizontal Progress Notifications\n✓ Font Size for File Name and Progress Notifications\n✓ Help Page contains full tutorial for Download Status Bar. (Right click Downloads button and select Help option from context menu to open up Help Page)\n✓ Rename Window Interface Update. (It is quicker to rename file now by separated File Name and Extension textboxes.)\n✓ Double Click functionality for Download Item can be set to either Launch or Show File via Options Window. It is placed under "Ask confirmation before deleting downloaded file".\n✓ Keyboard short-cut change via "extensions.downloadbar.shortcutkey" preference if you have a conflicting short-cut. You need to restart Firefox for the new short-cut.\n✓ "Send to" feature to send files to selected folders. Defaults are Desktop and Downloads directory and you can also chose another directory by Custom option.\n\n✓ Locale en-US\n✓ Locale fi-FI Finnish\n✓ Locale de German\n✓ Locale it Italian\n✓ Locale nl Dutch\n✓ Locale pl Polish\n✓ Locale sv-SE Swedish\n✓ Locale zh-CN Chinese (Simplified)\n✓ Locale zh-TW Chinese (Traditional)\n✓ Locale pt-BR Portuguese (Brazilian)\n✓ Locale tr Turkish\n✓ Locale hu Hungarian\n✓ Locale ro Romanian\n✓ Locale ja-JP Japanese\n✓ Locale ru Russian\n✓ Locale fr French\n✓ Locale mk-MK Macedonian\n\nAtunci când descărcați fișiere de pe internet, Download Status Bar va plasa în mod automat elementele de progres aferente în bara de descărcări.  După cum sugerează numele, bara de descărcări este o bară, plasată în partea de jos a ferestrei navigatorului, în general deasupra barei de suplimente.  Deoarece Download Status Bar este ușor de utilizat și destul de inteligentă, bara de descărcări va fi vizibilă numai atunci când există o descărcare activă. Dacă nu există nici o descărcare de afișat, bara de descărcări se ascunde în mod automat pentru a păstra zona paginii web cât mai mare.  Și, evident, se va afișa din nou, în mod automat, atunci când începe descărcarea unui fișier.\n\nDacă doriți să afișați bara de descărcări, chiar dacă nu există nici o descărcare, puteți folosi tastele directe menționate mai jos:\n\n<b>Windows: Ctrl+Alt+D</b>\n\n<b>Mac OS X: shift+alt+D</b>\n\n<b>Linux: Ctrl/Cmd+Alt+D</b>\n\nDe asemenea, puteți să utilizați aceste taste directe și pentru a ascunde în orice moment bara de descărcări.  Cu alte cuvinte, aceste taste directe comută între afișarea și ascunderea barei. O altă posibilitate de comutare este selectarea opțiunii „Download Status Bar” din meniul „Unelte”.\n\nDupă afișarea barei de descărcări, veți observa butonul „Descărcări” în marginea stângă și butonul „Curăță bara” în marginea dreaptă a acesteia.  Butonul „Descărcări” este butonul principal al extensiei Download Status Bar pe care puteți da clic pentru a afișa meniul contextual al acesteia.  Butonul „Curăță bara” este folosit pentru a elimina toate elementele aferente descărcărilor finalizate din bara de descărcări.\n\nDând clic pe butonul „Descărcări”, veți avea acces la meniul contextual al extensiei, ale cărui componente și acțiuni sunt descrise mai jos:\n<ul><li><b>Opțiuni:</b> deschide o casetă în care se pot selecta opțiuni pentru personalizarea extensiei după preferințe.</li><li><b>Statistici:</b> afișează o pagină care conține informații și grafice privind descărcările anterioare.</li><li><b>Afișează toate descărcările:</b> deschide colecția implicită de descărcări a Firefox unde sunt afișate toate descărcările anterioare.</li><li><b>Afișează descărcările într-o filă:</b> afișează colecția implicită de descărcări a Firefox într-o filă nouă.</li><li><b>Descărcări:</b> deschide un submeniu care oferă posibilitatea suspendării, reluării, anulării și eliminării elementelor aferente descărcărilor, prin câte o singură acțiune.</li><li><b>Ajutor:</b> afișează o pagină web de unde puteți obține informații detaliate despre utilizarea extensiei într-un mod eficient.</li><li><b>Ascunde bara:</b> ascunde bara de descărcări.</li></ul>Atunci când descărcați fișiere de pe internet, Download Status Bar plasează automat elemente de descărcare în bara de descărcări.  Mai jos sunt câteva legături la fișiere de pe <a rel="nofollow" href="https://outgoing.prod.mozaws.net/v1/cb7014a0c2178ecdf3e045e4ea94cf79073d3b561b55f79183ce20a80f8ff919/http%3A//Mozilla.org">Mozilla.org</a>, ca exemple de descărcare.  Dați clic pe ele pentru a începe descărcarea.\n\n<a rel="nofollow" href="https://outgoing.prod.mozaws.net/v1/6c67e8b626205e8d96b2d0baae45371c6e78c868557026da755005d4e8e7a252/https%3A//download.mozilla.org/%3Fproduct=firefox-26.0&amp;os=osx&amp;lang=en-US">Firefox</a>\n\n<a rel="nofollow" href="https://outgoing.prod.mozaws.net/v1/39095e96302fa4a3ec79a21be70f48cc2e81264f2ac558b4ee3b1eee69401bb9/https%3A//download.mozilla.org/%3Fproduct=thunderbird-24.2.0&amp;os=osx&amp;lang=en-US">Thunderbird</a>\n\n<a rel="nofollow" href="https://outgoing.prod.mozaws.net/v1/0ccc94a0a65abe25cd784b751705b07f456f03363e6919bd64b537f8fd320fda/https%3A//download.mozilla.org/%3Fproduct=seamonkey-2.23&amp;os=osx&amp;lang=en-US">Seamonkey</a>\n\nFiecare element de descărcare conține următoarele informații:\n\nDe asemenea, dând clic-dreapta pe un element de descărcare veți avea acces la un meniu contextual ale cărui opțiuni sunt descrise în continuare:\n<ul><li><b>Deschide:</b> deschide sau lansează în execuție fișierul descărcat.  Această opțiune devine disponibilă după ce descărcarea s-a finalizat.</li><li><b>Deschide dosarul de stocare:</b> localizează și afișează fișierul descărcat în dosarul care îl conține.</li><li><b>Afișează toate descărcările:</b> afișează colecția fișierelor descărcate.</li><li><b>Scanează împotriva virușilor:</b> scanează manual împotriva virușilor fișierul descărcat cu programul antivirus desemnat.  Această opțiune vă cere să localizați și să desemnați un program antivirus, dacă nu ați făcut-o deja.</li><li><b>Verifică suma de control:</b> deschide o casetă de dialog în care se afișează, la alegere, sumele de control MD5, MD2, SHA1, SHA256, SHA384, SHA512, ale fișierului descărcat pe care, apoi, le puteți compara cu cele cunoscute ca fiind corecte.</li><li><b>Redenumește fișierul:</b> deschide o caseta de dialog în care puteți modifica denumirea și extensia fișierului descărcat.  Această opțiune devine disponibilă după ce descărcarea s-a finalizat.</li><li><b>Șterge fișierul:</b> șterge definitiv fișierul de pe sistem.  Înainte de inițierea acțiunii se va cere o reconfirmare a ei.  Această opțiune devine disponibilă după ce descărcarea s-a finalizat.</li><li><b>Mergi la pagina de descărcare:</b> deschide pagina de descărcare a fișierului într-o filă nouă.</li><li><b>Copiază legătura de descărcare:</b> copiază legătura de descărcare a fișierului (URL) în memoria tampon.</li><li><b>Anulează:</b> anulează descărcarea și șterge fișierul din sistem.  Această opțiune este disponibilă numai pentru descărcările în curs.</li><li><b>Suspendă:</b> suspendă o descărcare activă.</li><li><b>Reia:</b> reia o descărcare suspendată.</li><li><b>Elimină elementul de descărcare:</b> elimină elementul de descărcare din bara de descărcări.</li></ul>Dând clic pe un element de descărcare se va afișa o casetă cu informații despre descărcarea respectivă, ale căror semnificații detaliate sunt redate în continuare:\n<ul><li><b>Sursă:</b> sursa (URL-ul) fișierului descărcat.  Un clic pe această legătură va deschide pagina sursă într-o filă nouă.  Cu clic-dreapta va fi afișată opțiunea de copiere a legăturii.</li><li><b>Destinație:</b> locația unde este salvat fișierul descărcat.</li><li><b>Viteză curentă:</b> viteza curentă de descărcare a fișierului, în KB/s.</li><li><b>Viteză medie:</b> viteza medie de descărcare a fișierului, în KB/s.  Această informație va fi disponibilă după finalizarea descărcării.</li><li><b>Progres:</b> procentul din dimensiunea totală a fișierului, care s-a descărcat.</li><li><b>Timp rămas:</b> timpul rămas până la finalizarea descărcării.</li><li><b>Timp descărcare:</b> timpul total de descărcare.  Această informație va fi disponibilă după finalizarea descărcării.</li><li><b>Descărcat:</b> numărul de KB descărcați și numărul total de KB pe care îi are fișierul.</li><li><b>Dimensiune fișier:</b> dimensiunea fișierului pe disc.  Această informație va fi disponibilă după finalizarea descărcării.</li><li><b>Sumă de control MD5:</b> suma de control MD5 calculată automat.  Această informație va fi disponibilă după finalizarea descărcării.</li></ul>Caseta cu informații mai conține și o miniatură a fișierului descărcat, dacă acesta este o imagine.  Sunt afișate miniaturi pentru tipurile PNG, JPG, GIF și BMP.  Un clic pe miniatură va deschide imaginea descărcată într-o filă nouă.\n\nAceleași informații despre descărcare, redate mai sus, sunt prezentate și în balonul informativ care se afișează la survolarea cu mausul a elementului de descărcare.\n\n<b>Sfat:</b> Cu dublu-clic pe un element de descărcare se deschide automat fișierul descărcat.\n\n<b>Sfat:</b> Cu dublu-clic pe bara de descărcare se elimină automat toate elementele aferente fișierelor complet descărcate.\n\n<b>Sfat:</b> Cu clic-mijloc (clic cu rozeta) pe un element de descărcare se elimină acesta din bara de descărcare.\n\n<b>Sfat:</b> Cu clic pe spațiul liber al barei de descărcare se afișează meniul contextual al extensiei.\n\nAspectul și comportamentul extensiei pot fi personalizate după preferințe în caseta „Opțiuni”.  Puteți deschide această casetă dând clic-dreapta pe butonul „Descărcări” sau pe spațiul liber al barei de descărcări și selectând elementul „Opțiuni”.  Ca alternativă, puteți deschide caseta și selectând din meniul „Unelte” al navigatorului opțiunea „Suplimente”, deschizând secțiunea „Extensii”, căutând extensia „Download Status Bar” și dând clic pe butonul „Opțiuni” aferent extensiei.  Opțiunile disponibile în prima secțiune a casetei sunt descrise în continuare:\n<ul><li><b>Se elimină elementul din bară după deschiderea fișierului:</b> se elimină automat din bara de descărcări elementul de descărcare după deschiderea/lansarea fișierului din meniul contextual sau cu dublu-clic.</li><li><b>Se elimină elementul din bară după afișarea fișierului în dosarul care îl conține:</b> se elimină automat din bara de descărcări elementul de descărcare după afișarea fișierului în dosarului care îl conține.</li><li><b>Se deschide automat dosarul de stocare a descărcărilor după finalizarea acestora:</b> se deschide automat dosarul care conține fișierul descărcat după finalizarea descărcării.</li><li><b>Se afișează automat o filă cu descărcări când pornește o descărcare:</b> se deschide automat colecția descărcărilor într-o filă nouă la pornirea unei descărcări.</li><li><b>Se elimină elementele descărcărilor finalizate când se închide navigatorul:</b> se elimină elementele de descărcare aferente descărcărilor finalizate la închiderea navigatorului.  Download Status Bar păstrează elementele de descărcare din sesiunile precedente și le afișează din nou în bara de descărcări la pornirea unei noi sesiuni.</li><li><b>Se cere confirmare înaintea ștergerii fișierelor:</b> pentru a evita ștergerea accidentală a unui fișier descărcat, se cere reconfirmarea ștergerii acestuia.  Puteți mări viteza de ștergere a fișierelor prin deselectarea acestei opțiuni.</li><li><b>Se ascunde automat bara de descărcări după finalizarea acestora:</b> se ascunde automat bara de descărcări după ce se finalizează toate descărcările.  Această preferință mărește zona de afișare a paginii web atunci când nu mai sunt descărcări active.  De asemenea puteți specifica un interval de timp după care bara de descărcări se va ascunde.</li><li><b>Tipuri de fișiere care se elimină automat:</b> se elimină automat elementele de descărcare aferente tipurilor de fișiere specificate, după intervalul de timp specificat.  Puteți tasta aceste tipuri de fișiere (extensii) separate prin virgule.  Pentru a specifica toate tipurile de fișiere, tastați caracterul asterisc „*”.</li></ul><b>Antivirus</b>\n\nÎn această secțiune puteți specifica opțiuni de scanare împotriva virușilor.\n<ul><li><b>Locație antivirus:</b> locația unde este instalat programul antivirus.  Dați clic pe butonul „Răsfoiește…” pentru a alege din sistem acest program.</li><li><b>Tipuri de fișiere care nu se scanează:</b> tipurile de fișiere care se elimină de la scanare.  Puteți tasta aceste tipuri de fișiere (extensii) separate prin virgule.</li><li><b>Parametri:</b> detalii de care are nevoie programul antivirus pentru a executa operațiunea de scanare.  Unele aplicații antivirus nu necesită parametri speciali, însă pentru a scana fișierul corect, acesta trebuie specificat programului antivirus.  Puteți folosi expresia „%1” ca substituent pentru locația fișierului descărcat care va fi transmisă programului antivirus.</li><li><b>Se scanează automat fișierele descărcate:</b> se scanează automat pentru viruși toate fișierele după finalizarea descărcării acestora.</li></ul><b>Notificare</b>\n\nÎn această secțiune puteți opta pentru notificarea sonoră a finalizării descărcărilor.\n<ul><li><b>Locație fișier audio:</b> locația unde se găsește fișierul sunet preferat pentru notificare.  Dați clic pe butonul „Răsfoiește…” pentru a alege din sistem acest fișier.  Formatele de fișiere sunet acceptate sunt .ogg, .wav și .mp3.  Sunetul implicit de notificare este inclus în extensia Download Status Bar.</li><li><b>Redare sunet:</b> puteți asculta sunetul ales pentru notificarea sonoră dând clic pe butonul ► al playerului încorporat.</li><li><b>Se notifică sonor finalizarea descărcărilor:</b> se emite o notificare sonoră cu sunetul ales sau cel implicit, după finalizarea descărcărilor.</li><li><b>Inițializează setările:</b> dând clic pe acest buton, toate opţiunile de notificare vor reveni la valorile iniţiale.</li></ul><b>Afișare</b>\n\nÎn această secțiune puteţi personaliza interfaţa extensiei Download Status Bar.\n\n<b>Culori</b>\n\nPuteți schimba aspectul elementelor de descărcare prin alegerea diverselor culori în acest grup de opțiuni.  Colorarea se face în degradé pentru a crea un efect de frumos pentru elementele de interfață.  Fiecare schimbare de culoare este aplicată imediat elementului respectiv:\n<ul><li><b>Fundal descărcare:</b> Alegeţi o culoare specifică pentru fundalul elementelor de descărcare.  Progresul descărcărilor se suprapune peste fundal, deci este posibil să apreciaţi şi pe baza culorilor starea descărcărilor active.</li><li><b>Progres descărcare:</b> Alegeţi o culoare specifică pentru progresul descărcărilor active.</li><li><b>Text descărcare:</b> Alegeţi o culoare specifică pentru textul de pe elementele de descărcare.</li><li><b>Descărcare completă:</b> Alegeţi o culoare specifică pentru elementele de descărcare aferente descărcărilor finalizate.</li><li><b>Descărcare în pauză:</b> Alegeţi o culoare specifică pentru elementele descărcărilor suspendate.</li><li><b>Bară de descărcare:</b> Alegeţi o culoare specifică pentru fundalul barei de descărcare.</li><li><b>Inițializează setările:</b> Dând clic pe acest buton, se vor restabili culorile iniţiale pentru elementele de descărcare. .</li></ul><b>Viteză de descărcare</b>\n\nPuteți atribui diferite culori pentru diferite viteze de descărcare, alegându-le în acest grup de opțiuni.  Aceste culori vor modifica culoarea progresului descărcări, dacă a fost aleasă vreuna.\n\n<b>Interfață</b>\n\nYou can change the interface of Download Status Bar by the fields provided in this options group:\n<ul><li><b>Bară de descărcare:</b> This is the default download interface for Download Status Bar. If you select this option, Download Items are put in the Download Bar which is placed at the bottom section of the browser.</li><li><b>Panou de descărcare:</b> If you want to keep your Download privacy from others, you can select this option to place all Download Items in a Toolbar Button Panel. The Toolbar Button will be placed in Add-on Bar as default. If there are no Add-on Bar or if Add-on Bar is hidden at the moment, the Toolbar Button will be placed inside the Navigation Toolbar of Firefox. Toolbar Button has also a counter next to it. First section of counter indicates the number of active downloads in progress and the second part of the counter indicates the number of completed downloads.</li></ul><b>Informații despre progres</b>\n\nYou can hide or show Progress Percent, Speed and Remaining Time items in the Progress Section of Download Items by tuning the checkboxes in this option group.\n\n<b>Aliniere elemente</b>\n\nYou can adjust the Progress Section alignment of Download Items by tuning the fields of this options group. Selecting Horizontal option will place Progress, Speed and Remaining Time elements side by side while switching to Vertical place all Progress elements in vertical position.\n\n<b>Element descărcare</b>\n\nYou can change the width and height values of a Download item  by tuning the fields in this options group:\n<ul><li><b>Lățime:</b> Place a numerical value in this field to set the width of the Download Item.</li><li><b>Înălțime:</b> Place a numerical value in this field to set the height of the Download Item.</li><li><b>Mărime font pentru denumirea fișierului:</b> Place a numerical value in this field to set the font size for the File Name of the Download Item.</li><li><b>Mărime font pentru progres:</b> Place a numerical value in this field to set the font size for the Progress Section of the Download Item.</li></ul><b>Se ascunde butonul „Curăță bara” din bara de descărcare:</b> Checking this option will hide Clear button in Download Bar.\n\n<b>Se ascunde butonul „Descărcări” din bara de descărcare:</b> Checking this option will hide Download button in Download Bar.\n\nAceastă pagină este disponibilă și în alte limbi:\n\n<a rel="nofollow" href="https://addons.mozilla.org/de/firefox/addon/download-status-bar/" title="Germană">de -
